story:
Glass- simple, clean, and re-usable. We have reached a tipping point on this Earth. A time when there are choices to be made. Here on the West Coast, San Francisco has become the first city to phase out plastic bottles. We at Bohemian glass are happy to fill that void, instead of trash cans.

The purpose of these bottles is to give YOU a healthy, handmade, beautiful, utilitarian choice. Will these bottles save the planet? No. But they won't make your water toxic. What's more, you get something that is intimately, beautifully yours. It will change your relationship to water in that subtle way favorite personal possessions have.

The funding goal is to cover one (1) months expenses at Berkeley Bohemian Glassblowing, our fledgling co-op studio in Berkeley.

Help us build this community. Help us bring these beautiful and functional water bottles to the greater community of the world. 


This video is artist, Lee Miltier, making one of his signature "Energy Bottles" with the help of the team at Berkeley Bohemian. Lee will be off-hand blowing each of these signature water bottles. To see more of Lee's award-winning artwork, visit www.leemiltier.com. 

Visit links below to see work by other members of the co-op!

story:
Jose's Story

My name is Jose from L.E.S., New York City. I am 1 brother of 10 siblings (obviously there wasn't a television available for my parents in the 80's). In my youth I’ve been the best at everything; poetry & rhyme, school, basketball, talking to the ladies, cooking a mean Kraft Mac & Cheese and being the family’s comedian.

Unfortunately I could be the best for long. Since 2006, I have been suffering with Parkinson's disease (PD) and the symptoms have worsened throughout the years. What does that mean? No more school; no more sports; no more ladies & no more home-cooked Mac & Cheese.  

Prior to my PD, I was a student at Borough of Manhattan Community College and employed at two jobs. Since then, I've lost employment and have not been able to continue my studies at school due to PD. I've been afraid to travel alone since an incident a few years back where I fell at a restaurant and could not get up without help. I was 28 years old. I want my life back!

I’m starting a campaign to raise awareness of PD and also to help me cover the cost for Microdose Therapy. Microdose Therapy can help me reduce my symptoms of PD. I would do anything to be able to stop my tremors, to sit down without assistance and to get up without thinking, “If I fall down I’ll have to wait until someone comes home from work to pick me up.” And that has happened before. 

Your help can fund the cost of Microdose Therapy, for which I will be forever grateful.

The Deal: Microdose Therapy costs $7,500. It is 7 weeks of intensive tests, therapy and education. After that, it’s $100 annually which I think I can try to pay for myself.

Where do the funds go if I don’t reach my goal? This isn’t an option for me. I will continue to save up until I can completely pay for it, even if it takes me years (which I hope is not the case). 

What if you don’t have the dough? I’m happy to at least get some advice on how I can control PD for the time being until I can afford Microdose Therapy.

Thank you for taking the time to read my message. Your help is extremely appreciated.

FYI - It took me 5 days to write this message. I’m cramping up… BRB.


Website on Microdose Therapy: www.helenfoundation.com

story:
EMF Protection Technology


Dangerous, Insidious EMF
(electromagnetic fields)

We live in an amazing age of technology where world class communication, information, and entertainment are at our fingertips with a click of a button or a swipe of the screen. 

However, along with this marvelous technology comes a very subtle, dangerous problem: Electromagnetic Fields (EMF).

Science shows that the following devices put out dangerous EMF:

  • Cordless and cell phones
  • Computer tablets
  • Laptops
  • Clock radios
  • Wi-fi
  • Microwaves
  • Everything electric creates EMF, some more than others. 

The danger is EMF energy is constantly pervading our bodies and over a period of time, can disrupt our cells and harm our health resulting in a number of serious medical conditions. 

What can we do to protect ourselves?

My name is Peter Kulish. I am the Founder and principal researcher/developer of BiomagScience, its advanced therapies and author of “Conquering Pain, The Art of Healing with Biomagnetism,” the therapy manual for over 170 medical conditions. BiomagScience Therapies are used by individuals, caregivers, practitioners, and clinics worldwide to increase vitality, provide pain relief and help resolve acute conditions and chronic illness.

The Problem

As a professional Biomagnetic researcher familiar with how magnetic fields affect people’s health, I am appalled about how few people know about the dangers of EMF. 

It’s a basic law of physics that all our electrically-run technologies put out EMF which goes through and pervades our bodies. 

As the magnetic fields pass through our body, they affect the electrons of the atoms which in complex arrangements, make up all the molecules and cells of our body.

Good magnetic fields, like BiomagScience therapy, provide an amplified form of the body’s natural energy which increases and supports cellular health.

With all the worldwide research about EMF producing:

  • nausea
  • depression
  • dementia
  • tumors
  • cancer and other conditions

It is surprising how few people know about the dangers of EMF.

Bad magnetic fields like the pulsing EMF from our cell phones, computers, wifi, or electrical devices disrupt the cellular electrons and over a period of time, weaken the cells and our health.

EMF cellular deterioration can cause fatigue, nausea, depression, illness, and in some cases, premature death.

Just recently, an acquaintance who used a laptop continuously on her lap for several months while she sat with her father in hospice, developed aggressive colon cancer and died sometime thereafter. She was unaware of the high EMF coming from the laptop and unfortunately was not aware of how she could have protected herself.

The False Answer

To date, the following types of EMF protection devices are available:

  • pendants
  • braclets
  • stick-on devices
  • plug-in devices

These devices were invented to neutralize EMF, but they cannot stop the EMF from affecting the body’s cells and as one scientific group who tested these devices so plainly put it: “they don’t work.”

The EMF Solution

BiomagScience has worked with individuals who had EMF health issues. In each case their cellular energy (voltage measurements) and overall vitality was extremely low and as a result, they were very ill.

We worked with a middle-aged flight attendant who had migraines, a constant cold and chronic fatigue from EMF. The woman explained that constant sickness is common in her profession. I wasn’t surprised because when measured, the EMF in a plane was extremely high – literally a flying EMF oven – no wonder so many flying professionals don’t live long lives.

We have also helped several people who were so Electro-Sensitive that they had to move to an electric-free house to get relief from the nausea, fatigue and illness from the EMF of the refrigerator, heater fan, washing machine, etc. These individuals suffered from very low vitality. 

Microscopic picture of typically low-energy, sick blood cells clustered together in Rouleau pattern from EMF, illness, or diet. 

This condition produces very poor nutritional delivery to the cells and incomplete detoxification of the cells. 


Within 40 minutes of BiomagScience Daytime therapy, the Rouleau pattern, low-vitality blood cells became charged into their single, healthy placement that efficiently delivers nutrition and efficiently detoxifies.



The Answer

In each of the EMF cases, simple Biomagnetic therapy (good magnetic fields) were used on key energizing points to rebuild their cellular energy. At one point, their vitality/voltage increased enough to overcome their sensitivity to the EMF and resolve their medical conditions.

The stewardess got rid of her constant cold, migraines, and chronic fatigue and the Electro-Sensitive individuals were able to move back to their homes and live normally.

Good health is based on high cellular vitality which provides
efficient metabolism of nutrition and detoxification.

BiomagScience has proven over and over again, that simple, daily Biomagnetic energy supplementation helps maintain high cellular energy and wellness.

BiomagScience advanced therapies have produced miracle-like results in helping resolve extremely acute and chronic medical conditions – many unknown to BiomagScience may very well have occurred from long-term EMF exposure.


Case Study

     Bedridden for 25 years from malabsorption starts
to heal in an hour of magnet therapy

The following case shows the results of BiomagScience therapy on someone who very ill from low cellular vitality. The condition and results of this case is exactly the same as the EMF electro-sensitive people whose cellular vitality is very low.

In 1980, the subject, a middle-aged woman, developed malabsorption from chemical poisoning which restricted her cells ability to absorb micro-nutrients or detoxify and as a result, she developed fibromyalgia, CFS and immense pain standing. Her cells (below) registered very low vitality/voltage. 

Many allopathic and alternative therapies including improper biomagnetic therapy (Nikken) were tried; but because her body was so weak from malabsorption, the woman was chronically ill and bedridden for 25 years. 

With a customized nutritional program for 3 years, the cell’s membrane energy (parallel capacitance) could only increase 25pF (pico Farads) and then continued to remain stuck and would not progress any further until BiomagScience therapy was initiated.

Normal healthy cell membranes have a membrane capacitance of 750-850pF. That is the amount of energy a healthy person has to pull in nutrients and push out toxins. The woman's last two tests before BiomagScience therapy were on Nov 18, 2004 and seven months later on June 14, 2005. Both tests measured 400pF - typical of her chronically ill fixed pattern through the years.

Right after her voltage testing on June 14, 2005, BiomagScience therapy was applied and within an hour, her capacitance increased 107pF to 507pF - an energy increase which immediately unstuck the 25-year condition and resolved the malabsorption.
Cellular Membrane Voltage Capacitance Tests
    Voltage Test: 18-Nov-04 400 pF – Stuck Cells
    Voltage Test: 14-400 pF 400 pF – Stuck Cells
60 min therapy: 14-Jun-05 507 pF – Un-Stuck Cells

After a month of BiomagScience therapy, her pain was eliminated and her energy increased so much, she was able to resume her profession of singing and song writing. Within a year, she was playing competitive tennis.

Conclusion: A classic case of malabsorption - the cells did not have enough energy to absorb the required micro-nutrients needed to create more energy – literally stuck with no hope until BiomagScience therapy charged the cells helping overcome the low energy and setting the woman onto the road to recovery.

BiomagScience therapy increases cellular
energy, vitality  and wellness.



Keeping Your Cells Charged Bio-Magnetically

Is the Best Defense Against EMF while also

Providing  Good Health & Vitality


In summation, using BiomagScience’s simple Daytime therapy and drinking “Energized Water” provides the essential supplemental energy to increase cellular vitality which helps to achieve and maintain good health which is the best defense against EMF.


 

The EMF Kit provides Energy and Vitality.
Power Wafers for the body and Water Jar Energizers for
Energized Healthy Water
 
 

Daytime therapy on a man. Women wear the magnet
on their bra. Can also be worn on back of neck.

 The Proposal

BiomagScience needs $80,000 to formalize a before and after clinical study through licensed medical practitioners to test BiomagScience therapies on EMF electro-sensitive patients and long-term, chronically ill patients. Proceeds will be used to acquire individuals for tests cases under primary medical review, acquiring Bio-cellular Impedance Analysis (cellular voltage) instrumentation, before and after blood panels, microscopy for blood and tissue analysis, and finalization of clinical study.


The Results

The BiomagScience study will be published to notify the public about the EMF problem and that the simple, preventative method of energizing the body not only defends against EMF, but it fully supports a return to good health and wellness for those who are ill.

The study will show how BiomagScience therapies provide the support to overcome and help resolve a multitude of chronic conditions - important information to everyone everywhere.

Thank you for your help. BiomagScience has been on a mission to help people. We have developed advanced therapies that have brought people out of terminating comas, regenerated severed nerves, helped increase healing 4-6 times faster, regenerated herniated discs to full height, help overcome genetic problems.

Your help with this study will help generate the truth and consciousness of what advanced, simple magnetic therapy has achieved when used correctly. It is an important science for everyone to use to be healthy and live longer.

Best of health,
Peter Kulish

story:
My name is Jolyn A Rose. I have known Kian since he was in his mother's tummy. He has been a peaceful lover for 20 years. He was attacked on May 10th, 2014, rendering him unable to work, while he heals. This is a campaign for friends and family to contribute to help Kian recover. 3 thousand people prayed for him and sent him love and light. Now he just needs a little help getting over the financial hurdle of rent and food.


.

The Impact

Kian's Road to Recovery and Healing

On May 10th, 2014, 20 year old Kian Little Cann, son of Heidi Little, was attacked in his own home. An old friend, came over with the intent to harm someone, and under the influence, began to abuse his old girlfriend. Kian stepped in and asked him to leave, and was punched out, while he lay unconscious on the ground the attacker ( who is up for one felony and 3 Misdemeanor charges) ran and kicked Kian in the back of the head. Resulting in a cracked skull and multiple bleeds to the brain.

Kian was $10.00 short for rent that was due on the 9th of May. This campaign is to help Kian pay his rent and buy grocery's while he recovers.

He currently owe's $450.00 for May and June is almost here. His mother Heidi has been doing all she can.

The healers and lovers of the world have been doing all they can.

To date we thank the Ronald McDonald house for putting up Heidi and Hanna ( Kian's 8 year old sister) while they worked day and night to help heal Kian through prayer and alternative medicine ( Reiki and Chi Kong, global prayer) along with the  nurses, and doctors at the Fletcher Allan Hospital in Burlington Vermont, specifically the nurses and doctor's in the  ICU where Kian spent 4 days THANK YOU !! and the nurses and Doctors that worked with Kian on the neurological brain unit Thank YOU !!

Please help us help Kian.

He has dedicated his life to peace with his mother Heidi for his 20 years on this planet. He deserves to heal in peace.

We love you, we thank you , we respect you.

Please share widely if you cannot contribute monetarily. Everything helps if it's done in love , care and support. There are indie gogo share tools !!


Us helping another angel to become again, an active participant in transforming this world into further beauty and grace, is our reward. Love Kian's mom Heidi XO !!!


The full story:

On May 10th, 2014, 20 year old peace keeper, Kian Little Cann was at his home, with a few friends, haniging out. When a messy minded and intoxicated one showed up looking for a fight. The attacker let himself in the house, and everyone tolerated him , while hoping he would leave. His ex girlfriend was at the gathering. After a bit of time, the attacker got the ex girlfriends downstairs and began to abuse her publicly. Kian stepped in and said he had to go , he could not do this here, and he would call the police. The attacker sucker punched Kian to the right eye, knocking him unconscious, from the 4 eye witnesses, the attacker then backed up and ran and kicked Kian in the back of the head while he lay unconscious on the ground. Then he pulled a knife on another young adult , cutting him, and then was chased off.

Through the night Kian's roomate and bff Jake Hunt, sat up with him, waking him up every hour, and taking care of his vommitting friend until he could call his parents to help at 6 am. Jake help save Kian's life. Thank you Jake. Then Jake's parents called heidi ~ Kian's mom, in texas and collectivley convinced Kian to go to the hospiatal. he was just going to go to work, he needed to make hi srent. Heidi phoned the attackers Mom and received the voicemail where she left a tormented and anguished message about what had happened to Kian becouse of her son. The mother of the attacker, drove to Kian's house, and had the attacker call Heidi ( Kian's mother) and apoloigize, he also lied and siad Kian hit the cement he didn't kick him. SHeidi hung up, the mom of the attacker kicked him out of the car, and then went to Kian 's house where she held Kian's  head while he vomited,, listened to Jake's father tell what he thought of the attacker, unknowing that this woman was his mother, Then she put Kian in her car and drove him to the hospital. Where she reported to Heidi the condition an status of her son , and where she gave Heidi her credit card to get a flight to Burlington Vermont where they were taking Kian by ambulancd. TheHunt family and the attackers mother followed the ambulance to burlington  and made sure he was taken care of and stable. Heidi and Hanna arrived on Sunday afternoon and thank the mother who helped with what she could.

Heidi called in all the angels' she flies with from her social networks, and network as the Director and co founder of International Children's Month, pllus the blessings of all the healers she knows. The Little family has been working on global peace and respcet love and care for all for their lives, Kian included. The support they received was beautiful. Thousands of people offered prayers and energy healing. Heidi's immediate circle Grandfather Golden Eagle, Frank Wise, Jay, Aunty Jolyn,  Bob Challenger, Nancy Hummingbird, the Eldred's all stepped up and helped Heidi and Helped Kian and Helped Hanna. The whole thing has revealed many injustices in the systems. And many beautiful things of power within the people. Kian is now resting comfortably and worried about how to pay his bills so his roommate isn't in trouble or his landlords, ... IN love and light , healing and recovery we trust. Follow up appointments, are now being booked, and some help is happening from the insurance of  New York state agencies/ Victim's services so his  medical bills can be helped. We pray for his healing and recovery to continue on all levels. He remains positive, and hopeful of the future.
story_txt: My name is Jolyn A Rose. I have known Kian since he was in his mother's tummy. He has been a peaceful lover for 20 years. He was attacked on May 10th, 2014, rendering him unable to work, while he heals. This is a campaign for friends and family to contribute to help Kian recover. 3 thousand people prayed for him and sent him love and light. Now he just needs a little help getting over the financial hurdle of rent and food. .The ImpactKian's Road to Recovery and HealingOn May 10th, 2014, 20 year old Kian Little Cann, son of Heidi Little, was attacked in his own home. An old friend, came over with the intent to harm someone, and under the influence, began to abuse his old girlfriend. Kian stepped in and asked him to leave, and was punched out, while he lay unconscious on the ground the attacker ( who is up for one felony and 3 Misdemeanor charges) ran and kicked Kian in the back of the head. Resulting in a cracked skull and multiple bleeds to the brain. Kian was $10.00 short for rent that was due on the 9th of May. This campaign is to help Kian pay his rent and buy grocery's while he recovers.He currently owe's $450.00 for May and June is almost here. His mother Heidi has been doing all she can. The healers and lovers of the world have been doing all they can. To date we thank the Ronald McDonald house for putting up Heidi and Hanna ( Kian's 8 year old sister) while they worked day and night to help heal Kian through prayer and alternative medicine ( Reiki and Chi Kong, global prayer) along with the  nurses, and doctors at the Fletcher Allan Hospital in Burlington Vermont, specifically the nurses and doctor's in the  ICU where Kian spent 4 days THANK YOU !! and the nurses and Doctors that worked with Kian on the neurological brain unit Thank YOU !! Please help us help Kian. He has dedicated his life to peace with his mother Heidi for his 20 years on this planet. He deserves to heal in peace.We love you, we thank you , we respect you.Please share widely if you cannot contribute monetarily. Everything helps if it's done in love , care and support. There are indie gogo share tools !! Us helping another angel to become again, an active participant in transforming this world into further beauty and grace, is our reward. Love Kian's mom Heidi XO !!! The full story:On May 10th, 2014, 20 year old peace keeper, Kian Little Cann was at his home, with a few friends, haniging out. When a messy minded and intoxicated one showed up looking for a fight. The attacker let himself in the house, and everyone tolerated him , while hoping he would leave. His ex girlfriend was at the gathering. After a bit of time, the attacker got the ex girlfriends downstairs and began to abuse her publicly. Kian stepped in and said he had to go , he could not do this here, and he would call the police. The attacker sucker punched Kian to the right eye, knocking him unconscious, from the 4 eye witnesses, the attacker then backed up and ran and kicked Kian in the back of the head while he lay unconscious on the ground. Then he pulled a knife on another young adult , cutting him, and then was chased off. Through the night Kian's roomate and bff Jake Hunt, sat up with him, waking him up every hour, and taking care of his vommitting friend until he could call his parents to help at 6 am. Jake help save Kian's life. Thank you Jake. Then Jake's parents called heidi ~ Kian's mom, in texas and collectivley convinced Kian to go to the hospiatal. he was just going to go to work, he needed to make hi srent. Heidi phoned the attackers Mom and received the voicemail where she left a tormented and anguished message about what had happened to Kian becouse of her son. The mother of the attacker, drove to Kian's house, and had the attacker call Heidi ( Kian's mother) and apoloigize, he also lied and siad Kian hit the cement he didn't kick him. SHeidi hung up, the mom of the attacker kicked him out of the car, and then went to Kian 's house where she held Kian's  head while he vomited,, listened to Jake's father tell what he thought of the attacker, unknowing that this woman was his mother, Then she put Kian in her car and drove him to the hospital. Where she reported to Heidi the condition an status of her son , and where she gave Heidi her credit card to get a flight to Burlington Vermont where they were taking Kian by ambulancd. TheHunt family and the attackers mother followed the ambulance to burlington  and made sure he was taken care of and stable. Heidi and Hanna arrived on Sunday afternoon and thank the mother who helped with what she could. Heidi called in all the angels' she flies with from her social networks, and network as the Director and co founder of International Children's Month, pllus the blessings of all the healers she knows. The Little family has been working on global peace and respcet love and care for all for their lives, Kian included. The support they received was beautiful. Thousands of people offered prayers and energy healing. Heidi's immediate circle Grandfather Golden Eagle, Frank Wise, Jay, Aunty Jolyn,  Bob Challenger, Nancy Hummingbird, the Eldred's all stepped up and helped Heidi and Helped Kian and Helped Hanna. The whole thing has revealed many injustices in the systems. And many beautiful things of power within the people. Kian is now resting comfortably and worried about how to pay his bills so his roommate isn't in trouble or his landlords, ... IN love and light , healing and recovery we trust. Follow up appointments, are now being booked, and some help is happening from the insurance of  New York state agencies/ Victim's services so his  medical bills can be helped. We pray for his healing and recovery to continue on all levels. He remains positive, and hopeful of the future.

story:
Short Summary

FeenPhone sounds much better than Skype, Mumble, TeamSpeak, Blink, Ventrilo, Google Hangouts, mobile phones or landlines.

FeenPhone is no-cost software that opens up a global world of possibilities for real-time high-quality voice media production, or simply conversation, over any distance.

Before FeenPhone, there has never been a way to do ultra-high-quality full-duplex talk communication in real time for free. FeenPhone does all this, and you can start using it today.

But we have a lot of round-two improvements we'll need to make to revolutionize no-cost high-quality real-time spoken audio over the Internet. 

Why not just use Existing programs?

FeenPhone is superior to other voice-over-Internet programs or mobile phones in audio quality. FeenPhone sounds crystal clear compared to all these programs / platforms.

And these programs aren’t truly duplex; when one person speaks loudly, it cuts out the quieter person. This makes conversations sound unnatural. Even experienced radio hosts sometimes naturally talk over each other a little bit, especially at the end of one person speaking and the start of another person speaking. We needed software that is full-duplex so the audience feels like they’re in the same room with the people speaking, rather then having it feel like one person should say “Over…” when finished with a sentence. FeenPhone being true duplex makes it superior to all other programs in making conversations more conversational….more natural, less artificial

Another way the true duplex makes FeenPhone better is in producing a show with remote co-hosts using music. With other programs, when the bumper music comes in, any host talking over it to lead into, or out of, a talk segment gets squashed down by the music, and you can’t easily hear what they’re saying. With FeenPhone, both the music and the other person sounds clear.

Skype, Mumble, TeamSpeak, Blink, Google Hangouts etc. all have their uses…general phone calls or 50 people yelling at each other while gaming. But those VoIP programs are not sufficient for doing broadcast-quality conversational audio in real time over a distance. They’re all made for using cheap headset mics in noisy locations over varying quality Internet. Therefore, you’ll never get stellar sound from any of them. Plus, FeenPhone is P2P, those others use a central server to connect , which lowers audio quality and increases latency, audio artifacting and drop-outs. It also decreases privacy; some of those programs do not share their source code, so who knows how they work or what they’re doing with your data and call records?

The criteria for making audio for podcasting, radio and remote voiceover are different than for general phone calls and gaming. We created FeenPhone, a free program for podcasters, Internet radio shows, voiceover artists, filmmakers, radio hosts and radio station STL links that meets our unique needs. We built a ground-up peer-to-peer system designed for very low latency, no drop-outs and excellent sound when used in a room with little or no background noise with decent mics over good cable Internet (or even DSL) connections.


Uses for FeenPhone

FeenPhone enables ultra-high-quality spoken audio in real time when doing live media with others in remote locations. It is already being used by radio hosts and Internet radio hosts for great-sounding live shows. It’s being used by podcasters to make multi-host shows where the hosts live thousands of miles apart. It’s a boon for voiceover artists working with remote clients or producers.

FeenPhone can be used by filmmakers to direct and record voiceover talent in a different location for film narration, or to direct and record actors for ADR - dubbing lines after the filming is completed. It can be used to direct and record native speakers in other countries when dubbing foreign-language versions of films.

FeenPhone could be adapted for low-bandwidth ultra-high-quality one-to-many streaming servers for delivery of Internet radio shows.

FeenPhone can be used by radio stations for STL (studio-to-tower links). And this STL capability could be extended to connect a radio network to affiliate stations, replacing the need for costly satellite time, dishes and receiver hardware.

FeenPhone could be adapted for ultra-high-quality phone calls on mobile devices. FeenPhone can also be used to take calls on a call-in show, with better audio quality than other programs, and with much higher quality than phones. It could also be used by journalists in the field filing live reports, by radio hosts doing “man on the street” interviews and for live remotes from sporting and other events.

FeenPhone could be used for transmitting push-to-talk citizen journalism from rallies, demonstrations, police stops and arrests to send ultra-high-quality audio to a team and/or a remote recorder in case the transmitting device is confiscated. (Could be programmed so three quick pushes on the device key locks it in transmit mode until a code is entered to unlock it.) These are situations where it’s of the utmost importance that every word is audible and discernible, and cell phone audio is anything but clear.


FeenPhone Mission

Most independently produced audio sounds somewhat crunchy, awful, thin and/or distorted. If people have to struggle through your sound they’ll leave the website or change the channel and miss your message.

Some people with mediocre production quality make excuses about their audio being “good enough for the Internet”, but it’s a cop-out. And more people have never even considered their audio quality.

Independent Media will not be taken seriously until our production values match that of the mainstream media. And listeners who don’t specifically notice audio quality enough to say “That sounds great!” will still listen longer and more often to the better sounding show, all other things being equal. They will also recommend the better sounding show more to other people, even if they don’t know why.

You can be lazy and use other VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) programs right out the box to make mediocre disposable media. Those programs are good for calls, but are not made for making broadcast-quality media. FeenPhone is made for making broadcast-quality media. So you can use FeenPhone AND take a little bit of care to be stellar and make media that people crave, today and into the future, all over the earth and beyond. It's your choice.

Tech stuff

FeenPhone is true duplex and uses Opus codec over TCP (that's right, not UDP) with advanced intelligent buffer systems to lower latency and provide smooth, natural sound. It has no echo cancellation or noise reduction (by design). If this makes sense to you and you want to know more, please feel free to look at the source code, here.


Goals for FeenPhone

We will do as much work on improving FeenPhone as we can. If we get some funding, we'll do a bunch of improvements. If we get more funding we'll do more.

Here's a partial list of improvements we'd like to make:

--Automatic port forwarding.

--Encryption.

--Port randomizing option (within a range).

--General overall improvements in all functionalities.

--Ability to mute and block persons in conversation.

--Toggable gentle EQ boost at 12hz

--IP address display, and ability to copy IP address to the clipboard.

--Add a “Phone book” to save different IP connections and add name or label.

--Add ability to save different configurations name them so you call them up easily.

--Option to auto-adjust settings for best sound and lowest latency depending on network.

--WASAPI support for Audio In.

--Ability to roll over to a second pre-set IP if first connection is lost.

--Volume slider for each user

--Cough button.

--Audio alerts on incoming connection (can be toggled on/off)

--Audio alerts switchable to off.

--Switchable auto-answer function (with password protection).

--Auto-reconnect if the connection drops.

--Input / Output level sliders

--Ability to use stereo.

--Recording (WAV, 16-bit 44.1k mono and stereo).

--Mix Minus (this would be a holy grail, it would make this a killer app by replacing audio hardware).

--Automation interface with relay closures

--PAN left and right: for recording two-host shows for later mixing.

--WebRTC support (for callers calling in to a radio show or podcast).

--Pro interface and website.

--even higher audio quality and reliability

--IPv6 support.

--No clicking.

--Possible Windows Phone version.

--Possible Linux version via open sourcing (currently is Windows only)

--Possible Mac version via open sourcing.

--Possible Android version via open sourcing.


Licensing

FeenPhone is free to use and adopt. It's covered by the BipCot NoGov License. Source code is on GitHub and regularly updated. We encourage anyone to do anything with FeenPhone. Please let us know if you do. If it's cool, we'll link it.


Do you also take Bitcoin?

Yes!

1Q3QxoXcX5HYpkqRZ4uHXJXrmZzHehBZVP

Who We Are:

PROJECT LEADER: Michael W. Dean. Talk radio host on Freedom Feens show on Genesis Communications Network. The show is on three dozen commercial stations. Michael is a musician, an audio engineer and was creating and sharing spoken audio shows over the Internet in 1998. He was a first-adopter of podcasting, back in 2006.

Michael is also a technical writer for O'Reilly Media:

http://www.oreilly.com/pub/au/3220

Michael was the team leader and head publicist on the MeowBit, FreeSpeechMe and MouseCount software projects. He also does publicity for Bitshares: http://bitshares.org/community/team/

PROGRAMMER: Derrick Slopey. Derrick runs Alienseed Software. He developed MeowBit and the Silver Calculator App for Windows Phone.

WHO BENEFITS?

Media creators and media consumers. FeenPhone removes the price barrier to making ultra-high quality live collaborative spoken audio, taking it out of the hands of only the ultra-rich. 

WHAT DO THE BUTTON PERKS LOOK LIKE?

Other Ways You Can Help

--Install and try FeenPhone with a friend.
--Share our website link (www.FeenPhone.com) on your social networks.
--Send our link and a short note to reviewers and writers at magazines and blogs that cover any of these topics: podcasting, radio, voiceover, video production, tech, open-source.
--Tell Two Friends!

story:
For those of you that have never heard of fecal transplantation please do not let the thought of it put you off.


There is overwhelming scientific evidence proving the life saving benefits of this procedure. In clinical studies of Clostridium difficile infection the procedure is shown to be far more effective than antibiotics with a 90% cure rate. See video for more information. 


There is also evidence to show fecal transplantation can help various digestive disorders,  Parkinson's disease and even depression to mention a few. 


There are currently 3 NHS hospitals in the UK  trialling this procedure for patients with Clostridium difficile infection only.


There is also one private clinic in the UK that we are aware provides this treatment but with fees potentially running into many thousands of pounds this option is not available to everyone.


Due to the overwhelming demand for the procedure coupled with the lack of available options for treatment there has been a massive surge in home DIY transplants.


Without a properly screened donor patients are putting themselves at major risk of infection.
We plan to provide an online platform so that medically screened donors can  provide safely tested stool samples for home transplantation.


Patients will be able to choose a donor and pay (a much more affordable) fee on their credit card to have their sample delivered by express medical courier, all from the comfort of their own home. They will be safe in the knowledge that all donors must be screened to join the site.

 
There are presently no legal requirements regarding fecal transplants in the UK- The MHRA actually consider fecal transplants as food! Because of this we feel there needs to be a safe convenient alternative to the current options facing patients who would like to carry out home transplantations.

 

We were inspired to start this project after a close friend become very ill and nearly died due to the  lack of healthy donors  available in the UK.

 

Your funding will be used to build a state of the art secure online platform, for screening costs of initial donors and for a marketing campaign.


We will start by targeting patients and donors in  the UK but aim to expand the service globally.


This service could potentially  save and improve thousands of lives so get involved today and help make a difference.

story:
The Basics

Hi, I'm James. I'm 21 years old (yeah, I know I look young) and I'm a trans man living in BC who is in dire need of chest surgery. Yeah, need. Sounds dramatic, but this surgery means everything to me. It is not an elective procedure.

The dysphoria I experience due to my chest alone on a regular basis is overwhelming. I can't leave the house without experiencing crippling anxiety and discomfort, even with the inadequate flattening effect of a chest binder. 

And I don't mean to sound dramatic, but quite frankly? It's ruining my life. I can't go swimming, can't shower, can't get undressed, can't give hugs, can't go to the gym,  can't do anything without dysphoria. In the summer I wear hot, baggy clothes to disguise the lump under my shirt, and I've been slouching for so long that I'm starting to develop back problems.


I suffer greatly from depression, anxiety, severe OCD and ADHD, all of which make it extremely difficult for me to work, study, or even function normally as an adult. Despite ongoing attempts to get on disability, I have no income, and I'm currently living with my parents in a less-than-ideal home situation - struggling to care for my mother (who is similarly disabled by mental illness) and younger brother as well as dealing with the long process of going back to school to get my dogwood. 
I've tried to apply for MSP coverage for chest surgery in the past, but was basically told by my doctor that I'm 'not trans enough' to qualify, because I haven't yet chosen to start a course of testosterone - largely due to emotional instabilities that exacerbated the symptoms of my depression and anxiety when I tried the samples I was given, and partly for personal reasons that I won't go into here. We're still working on it, but even if I do manage to qualify for MSP coverage, there is only one MSP-approved surgeon for this type of procedure in the country, and the waiting list is so long that I'd still be looking at a three year wait. Can you believe that? ONE surgeon.


The Cost.

  • About a year ago, I contacted the MacLean clinic in Mississauga, Ontario, and was given a rough estimate of $8,000 for the procedure - which, due to the size of my chest, will likely be a double-incision/bilateral mastectomy.

  • If I can raise enough funds for the surgery itself, my father is willing to pay for all of the travel expenses.

  • If I don't reach my goal of $8,000, any money raised will be placed into a bank account set up with the specific purpose of saving money for my chest surgery. I won't touch it until then.


The Impact.

Let me be honest with you, here.

This surgical procedure? Would change my life.

I know that sounds a little melodramatic, but please understand that while it sounds fantastic, my expectations are realistic. I mean, I know that chest surgery isn't magically going to fix the rest of my dysphoria. It won't cure my depression, or even necessarily make me 'pass' any better. I have a long way to go before I can realise self-acceptance.

But it's going to completely change how I feel about my body. My self-esteem. My anxiety levels. The activities I can actually take part in once I have a flat chest.

This surgery, to me, means freedom. It means being one HUGE LEAP closer to not being trapped in a body that does not feel like it's my own.


    Signal boost, signal boost, signal boost!

    I realise that most of my friends - and most of the people who are reading this - are like me. You're young, you're broke, and what little you have is going towards school or bills.

    But if you could at least give me a signal boost - maybe share the link to this page on Facebook or wherever - it would honestly mean so much to me.
story_txt:
The Basics Hi, I'm James. I'm 21 years old (yeah, I know I look young) and I'm a trans man living in BC who is in dire need of chest surgery. Yeah, need. Sounds dramatic, but this surgery means everything to me. It is not an elective procedure. 
The dysphoria I experience due to my chest alone on a regular basis is overwhelming. I can't leave the house without experiencing crippling anxiety and discomfort, even with the inadequate flattening effect of a chest binder. 
And I don't mean to sound dramatic, but quite frankly? It's ruining my life. I can't go swimming, can't shower, can't get undressed, can't give hugs, can't go to the gym,  can't do anything without dysphoria. In the summer I wear hot, baggy clothes to disguise the lump under my shirt, and I've been slouching for so long that I'm starting to develop back problems.
I suffer greatly from depression, anxiety, severe OCD and ADHD, all of which make it extremely difficult for me to work, study, or even function normally as an adult. Despite ongoing attempts to get on disability, I have no income, and I'm currently living with my parents in a less-than-ideal home situation - struggling to care for my mother (who is similarly disabled by mental illness) and younger brother as well as dealing with the long process of going back to school to get my dogwood. I've tried to apply for MSP coverage for chest surgery in the past, but was basically told by my doctor that I'm 'not trans enough' to qualify, because I haven't yet chosen to start a course of testosterone - largely due to emotional instabilities that exacerbated the symptoms of my depression and anxiety when I tried the samples I was given, and partly for personal reasons that I won't go into here. We're still working on it, but even if I do manage to qualify for MSP coverage, there is only one MSP-approved surgeon for this type of procedure in the country, and the waiting list is so long that I'd still be looking at a three year wait. Can you believe that? ONE surgeon.
  
The Cost.

About a year ago, I contacted the MacLean clinic in Mississauga, Ontario, and was given a rough estimate of $8,000 for the procedure - which, due to the size of my chest, will likely be a double-incision/bilateral mastectomy.
If I can raise enough funds for the surgery itself, my father is willing to pay for all of the travel expenses. If I don't reach my goal of $8,000, any money raised will be placed into a bank account set up with the specific purpose of saving money for my chest surgery. I won't touch it until then. 
  
The Impact. Let me be honest with you, here.
This surgical procedure? Would change my life.
I know that sounds a little melodramatic, but please understand that while it sounds fantastic, my expectations are realistic. I mean, I know that chest surgery isn't magically going to fix the rest of my dysphoria. It won't cure my depression, or even necessarily make me 'pass' any better. I have a long way to go before I can realise self-acceptance.
But it's going to completely change how I feel about my body. My self-esteem. My anxiety levels. The activities I can actually take part in once I have a flat chest.
This surgery, to me, means freedom. It means being one HUGE LEAP closer to not being trapped in a body that does not feel like it's my own.

  
Signal boost, signal boost, signal boost! I realise that most of my friends - and most of the people who are reading this - are like me. You're young, you're broke, and what little you have is going towards school or bills.
But if you could at least give me a signal boost - maybe share the link to this page on Facebook or wherever - it would honestly mean so much to me.

ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY MEETS BEAUTIFUL DESIGN

From the sustainable body to the elegant technological core, every detail in AirVape combines beautiful engineering and meticulous craft. 

HOW SURE ARE WE OF OUR PRODUCT'S QUALITY?

AirVape works like a clock. We believe in our product and we are standing behind it. We offer limited lifetime warranty on Airvape.

SPECIFICATIONS

This high-tech gadget has a list of functionalities that beats its competition.




UNIQUE, TWO FILTER AIRFLOW TECHNOLOGY

AirVape is equipped with two filter screens and advanced airflow for clean vapor. The vapors' path is though 3 chambers for tasy, not overheated aroma.


GET STARTED 

1. PACK

Pack the chamber.

2. TURN IT ON / HEAT
Press it 3 times to turn it on. Lighting fast heating up in 20 seconds.

3. ENJOY AirVape
Experience the pleasure of true, smooth vapor extreme fast.


TEMPERATURE GUIDE

AirVape testers tried out different herbs, and reported awesome results and unlimited possibilities.

     

Few other examples of herbs you can vaporize : 


Benefits for Cigarette smokers

AirVape is one of the fist vaporizers that can have biggest benefit for cigarette smokers, because no other vaporizer heated up herbs this fast before...

  • You can light up a cigarette in about a few seconds - if it is windy, that would be a bit longer :)
  • Airvape ALWAYS heats up to optimal level in less then 20 seconds, no lighter needed

  • Cigarette smokers are burning the tobacco
  • AirVape heats up the tobacco to a point that lets the flavors escape without burning it. Healthier process then smoke in your lungs...

  • Cigarettes gets pricey if you smoke a lot
  • After purchasing AirVape, you can keep refilling it with loose tobacco, saving money!

  • Cigarette smokers always have to be cautious about their cigarette smell
  • AirVape does not burn herbs, therefore smell is reduced significantly!(same principles apply to SECOND HAND SMOKING)


INCLUDED IN KIT

AirVape

USB Charger Cable

Packing, Cleaning tool card

Cleaning Brush

Filter Screens

Rubber Mouthpiece cover


ABOUT US

AirVape is a company founded by Kornel, a 5-year veteran in the vaporizer industry, Chad, an experienced vaporizer device developer, and our enthusiastic designer team from Los Angeles, California . We believe in honest business and ONLY great product.

We are passionate about what we do, and we do it best! Designed over the past one year, AirVape is a product of dedication, passion and excellence!


FAQ  

What is an herbal vaporizer?

A herbal vaporizer is a device used to extract flavors and aromas from plants or herbs. 

A vaporizer gently heats herbs without combustion. No burning maximizes potency, aromas and flavors.

What is a liquid vaporizer? 

A liquid vaporizer is a battery-powered device that simulates tobacco smoking by producing a vapor that resembles smoke. A heating element known as an atomizer, vaporizes a liquid solution known as e-liquid. 

Is any herb included in kit?

AirVape kit does not contain any herbs of any form or kind.

What happens if we don't reach our goal? 

We selected flexible funding, if the funding goal isn't reached, we will still ship all orders.

Who can I contact with questions? 

You can send us an email any time to airvaporizer@gmail.com

What is your warranty policy?

We offer Ltd Lifetime Warranty

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer:

This product is intended for adults age 18 and over and of legal smoking age depending on your state and/or country. It is intended for legal use only. 

Keep all parts, herbs, and smoking blends away from children and pets. The Hippie  Vaporizer is not a medical device and it is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any ailment, disease or other condition.

Contributors must be aware of and abide by the laws and regulations that govern and restrict the purchase of these products in their state.

story:
Watch FunBags demonstration video on the gallery pages

Please take a minute to read my story

My name is Kurt Rix. I have lived in Lake Tahoe for over 10 years. Tahoe's main demographic is the athlete combined with the outdoor enthusiast. My vision is to create a venue to accomodate both. A Four acre recreation and training facility for todays extreme sports athletes and families alike. Imagine a way for you to practice your action sports skills safely without the fear of wrecking yourself or unsanitary conditions of a foam pit. FunBags Adventure Park plans to provide a safe, clean state of the art environment in which amateur and professional athletes can share their knowledge and passions for the sports they love.  A childrens program will be implemented called 'Snow Angels' in which a pro athlete will interact as a mentor for the day and engauge in the parks activities with the child. 

The Park will have an eatery offering healthy food choices with beer and wine options, outdoor seating with fire pits and clean restrooms with handicap facilities. Professional coaching and private lessons will be offered. A dryslope surface to practice your winter sports year round is our main goal. We have applied for permits for a future zipline and ropes course to be installed and a BMX bridge track is in our sights. There will be outdoor yoga classes and a Gibbon Slackline Park area. A signed safety and liability waiver will be required to use the facility. 

Other on property activities will include family recreation such as frisbee, croquet, cornhole and volleyball court. We are directly on the city bikepath and river so we will be offering bicycle and paddleboard/kayak rentals. The venue will have activity for all demographics not just extreme sports athletes. Video analysis and Professional photography services will also be offered.

As most of you know - I have been personally funding this project since October and with all of the political setbacks (aka permits, insurances TRPA policies etc.) have not been able to open the doors and generate any revenue as of yet. Our two biggest challenges are the cost for installation of a dry slope surface and insurances. I am reaching out to everyone I know to help get this park open.

I have a team of top pro athletes on stand by to coach, promote and help maintain the integrity of this Park. I needs a few finishing touches that will help get this off the ground. With the help of the community and a few other common minded people, we can do this. I have nearly exhausted all of my finances and resources that when I began, I thought would be enough to get this facility up and running. This project has out grown my wallet.

With each contribution you are getting more than the value of your donation in services or product. You are basically pre-purchasing either a day entrance or season pass to the park with some added perks. The opportunity to sponsor a child is available as well.

Please support the athletes, families and children's future in South Lake Tahoe. There is no expiration date on any value so your contribution will be honored whenever you visit the park.

 

Thanking you all in advance...........Kurt Rix

story: Marc Parent is a musician. He’s been a musician since he discovered guitar at the age 9 years old. Playing in various bands and writing his own songs, music was the very air that Marc breathed. But in 2012 Marc met a challenge that he never expected, he had a stroke. The stroke left him with little movement on his right side and the fact that playing music the way he always had may never happen again. However one night while searching the internet Marc came across a startling video on You Tube. The video was a 60 Minutes broadcast out of Australia show a new and contraversial treatment for stroke patients using a drug called Etanercept. The video shows the drug being administered by doctors in a Florida USA Clinic to several patients and also shows it has an immediate positive response. Within 30 days most of the stroke effects are gone and there have been no cases of it returning in over 900 recipients!  The treatment costs $7000 and with Marc’s inability to to work is out of range for him financially. Our goal is to raise the money and get him to Florida to receive this treatment which should allow him to return to a life of music. We appreciate anything you can do to help Marc!

story:
UPDATES

5/28/15: Thank you to those that helped us reach our $5,000 goal! Our campaign has reached InDemand status, so we will be keeping it live for three more days in hopes of surpassing $6,000.

5/14/15: Thank you to those that helped us reach our $2,000 goal in just SEVEN DAYS! However, it's not over yet! Can you and your friends help us reach $4,000 in the next seven days?_____________________________________________________________________________

Major League Quidditch (MLQ) is a national league that runs from June 1 to August 31. The majority of seasonal activity takes place between the first of June and the end of July.

Our aim is to present quidditch in an elegant, highly-consumable form that mirrors other sports’ professional leagues. MLQ will feature standardized schedules, high-level officiating, in-depth statistics and live or pre-recorded footage of all games. The central tenant of the league, setting it apart from previous quidditch leagues, is that we will be limiting the field of participating teams. This will both ensure that the teams are of a high-quality and maximize the amount of coverage that can be given to each team and each game.

The inaugural season of MLQ will begin on June 1, 2015 with eight teams. Starting in 2016, the league will consist of 16 to 20 teams from across the nation. 

As you may have guessed, founding a professional sports league is a massive undertaking. All funds for this campaign will go toward paying for uniforms, referee fees, field permits, non-profit status and equipment, among other things. 

What is quidditch? Quidditch is a co-ed, full-contact sport. 

Find out more about professional quidditch: mlquidditch.com

What do you get out of this? We are offering so many options you won't know which to purchase first! Below are a few staples you won't want to leave this page without.

FAN SHIRTS - SUPPORT YOUR HOME TEAM

Other fan shirts can be found in our gallery. Washington Admirals and Indianapolis Intensity will be posted on Friday. 

REPLICA JERSEYS - SUPPORT YOUR FAVORITE PLAYER

Other jerseys can be found in our gallery. Shorts currently not available for purchase.

MLQ OFFICIAL TRADING CARDS BY J.J. LYNN

 

Every player will have a trading card. You might have to trade to get your favorite!

Sparknotes time... How can you help?

1. Contribute - Look over the perk and contribute at a level that works for you. Maybe it's the Writing on the Wall perk where for $5, your name will go on the virtual sponsorship wall that will soon grace mlquidditch.com.

2. Spread the Word - Pass on our IndieGoGo information by sharing our link (http://igg.me/at/mlquidditch) so others get a chance to purchase some MLQ swag, like our league shirt (also available in blue):


3. Follow Us - Check us out on social media and keep up with our efforts. In our inaugural season, gaining a following is of the utmost importance:

FACEBOOK: facebook.com/mlquidditch
TWITTER: @mlquidditch
INSTAGRAM: @mlquidditch

For further inquiries, you can shoot us an e-mail at mlquidditch@gmail.com and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

story:
London2Calais October Convoy 

supported by rs21, Barac, Movement For Justice, London Palestine Action, Defend The Right To Protest and HaLOL
Facebook: www.facebook.com/London2Calais
Twitter: @LDN2Calais #donate2calais 
Email: londoncalaisconvoy@gmail.com
There are an estimated 4000 people living in 'The Jungle' refugee camp without adequate food, water, sanitation and shelter. We met pregnant women from Syria, young boys from Afghanistan and men from Sudan, Darfur, Eritrea, Pakistan and elsewhere based in the camp. Due to lack of medical facilities and inadequate sanitation, illness is spreading through the camp. People will struggle to make it through the coming winter months.

Our Previous Convoys


15th August 2015:
Our 7 car convoy delivered food, clothes and essential supplies to refugees in the Calais camp. 
As well as distributing 400 food packages in the 'The Jungle' we also provided a generator to power a school in the camp.
On this convoy we spent £2400. The bulk of this was spent on food (details below)

29th August 2015:
We sent 3 cars with clothes donations and 9 volunteers to help French charities with their clothes distribution. We reached over 500 people that day handing out clothes, sleeping bags and food. 
We also spent £300 on a much-needed water pump for the camp on this convoy.

Our Next Convoys:


19th September (Refugees welcome here, Day of Action)
3rd October (distribution of food)

Why Are We Going Back? 


Our previous distribution of 400 supply packages was a drop in the ocean. There were at least 100 people left in the queue when our supplies ran out.
Conditions are dire. The camp is a blight on the face of Europe. That people are forced to live in such conditions challenges every notion of Britain and France being 'advanced' or 'civilised' societies.
Since our return, Teresa May has been to Calais to hand over £7 million to 'boost security' - in what already resembles a military zone. The British government caused this crisis by a) refusing to take its share of refugees during the biggest displacement of people since the second world war and b) many people living in the camp have fled situations where Britain's meddling, interventions and military occupations have destroyed societies and caused an exodus of refugees. 

Our Goals

On the 3rd of October, we want to deliver at least 800 supply packages.  We urgently need more funding to increase the amount of packages we can distribute.
We will also continue to invest in items such as water pumps to deal with the flooding and generators to provide electricity.
We want to establish an ongoing campaign which challenges racism in the media and the government. We want to work alongside other groups. rs21, BARAC, Movement For Justice and  Defend The Right To Protest have affiliated with London2Calais and are joining our convoys. 
We want to force the British government to grant asylum to refugees living in Calais.

Your donations will fund emergency relief items such as:

FOOD

Rice, Tuna, Beans, Lentils, Flour, Tea, Long-life Milk, Vegetable Oil

SLEEPING BAGS

£5 can buy a sleeping bag to keep someone warm through winter

SANITARY ITEMS

Toilet Paper, Wipes, Sanitary Towels, Disinfectant 

MEDICINE

Plasters, Bandages

CLOTHES

Underwear, Socks


Would you like to help?

For the next convoy, we are no longer able to take on additional cars, in order to make sure the distribution runs well, we have limited the convoy to 20 cars.
We have also been overwhelmed with offers for donations of goods, however, we are currently working on getting the storage space to ensure all donations are distributed orderly. Please bring donations of goods directly to CalAid we will confirm as soon as possible once we have found a suitable storage space. 
In the meantime, some great ways to get involved are fundraisers, collections at work or by submitting a motion through your union branch. Please get your friends and colleagues together to raise money for people in Calais. This will allow us to make much needed longer-term investments in order to provide electricity and decent sanitary standards to the camp. 
If you would like to get involved on future convoys, please register here.

What's the money for?

On our first trip we spent approximately £2400 of £7748 raised. This leaves about £5348. £2000 covered 400 supply bags typically containing 200g Tuna, 1 tin Kidney Beans, 1 tin Chopped Tomatoes, 1l Long-life Milk, 300g sugar, 250g rice, 200g dates, cereal bars, 20 tea bags, toothbrush, tooth paste, sanitary items.
£350 was spent on a generator to power a school in the camp, £300 on a water pump to clean up flooding. 
Most of us paid for our own hostel and ferry crossing, a few claimed these from the campaign as it made the difference between them being able to come or not. A typical ferry crossing was £35 return trip. A typical hostel room was £35 per person. Fuel was not covered for any of the vehicles. 

We expect to use all of the remaining funds on this trip as we are increasing the content and amount of supply packs we distribute as well as growing the convoy. So please support and share this widely.

WE INTEND FOR THIS TO BE AN ONGOING CAMPAIGN - TERESA MAY IS SPENDING £7 MILLION ON INCREASED SECURITY IN CALAIS - OUR SIDE NEEDS FUNDS TO HELP PEOPLE IN CALAIS AND TO CHALLENGE THE GOVERNMENTS ROLE IN THIS CRISIS IT HAS CREATED.
story_txt:
London2Calais October Convoy 

supported by rs21, Barac, Movement For Justice, London Palestine Action, Defend The Right To Protest and HaLOL


Facebook: www.facebook.com/London2CalaisTwitter: @LDN2Calais #donate2calais Email: londoncalaisconvoy@gmail.com

There are an estimated 4000 people living in 'The Jungle' refugee camp without adequate food, water, sanitation and shelter. We met pregnant women from Syria, young boys from Afghanistan and men from Sudan, Darfur, Eritrea, Pakistan and elsewhere based in the camp. Due to lack of medical facilities and inadequate sanitation, illness is spreading through the camp. People will struggle to make it through the coming winter months.


Our Previous Convoys

15th August 2015:
Our 7 car convoy delivered food, clothes and essential supplies to refugees in the Calais camp. 
As well as distributing 400 food packages in the 'The Jungle' we also provided a generator to power a school in the camp.
On this convoy we spent £2400. The bulk of this was spent on food (details below)


29th August 2015:
We sent 3 cars with clothes donations and 9 volunteers to help French charities with their clothes distribution. We reached over 500 people that day handing out clothes, sleeping bags and food. 
We also spent £300 on a much-needed water pump for the camp on this convoy.
Our Next Convoys:

19th September (Refugees welcome here, Day of Action)
3rd October (distribution of food)



Why Are We Going Back? 


Our previous distribution of 400 supply packages was a drop in the ocean. There were at least 100 people left in the queue when our supplies ran out.
Conditions are dire. The camp is a blight on the face of Europe. That people are forced to live in such conditions challenges every notion of Britain and France being 'advanced' or 'civilised' societies.Since our return, Teresa May has been to Calais to hand over £7 million to 'boost security' - in what already resembles a military zone. The British government caused this crisis by a) refusing to take its share of refugees during the biggest displacement of people since the second world war and b) many people living in the camp have fled situations where Britain's meddling, interventions and military occupations have destroyed societies and caused an exodus of refugees. 


Our Goals
On the 3rd of October, we want to deliver at least 800 supply packages.  We urgently need more funding to increase the amount of packages we can distribute.

We will also continue to invest in items such as water pumps to deal with the flooding and generators to provide electricity.
We want to establish an ongoing campaign which challenges racism in the media and the government. We want to work alongside other groups. rs21, BARAC, Movement For Justice and  Defend The Right To Protest have affiliated with London2Calais and are joining our convoys. 
We want to force the British government to grant asylum to refugees living in Calais.

Your donations will fund emergency relief items such as:
FOOD
Rice, Tuna, Beans, Lentils, Flour, Tea, Long-life Milk, Vegetable Oil
SLEEPING BAGS
£5 can buy a sleeping bag to keep someone warm through winter
SANITARY ITEMS
Toilet Paper, Wipes, Sanitary Towels, Disinfectant 
MEDICINE
Plasters, Bandages
CLOTHES
Underwear, Socks



Would you like to help?

We have also been overwhelmed with offers for donations of goods, however, we are currently working on getting the storage space to ensure all donations are distributed orderly. In the meantime, some great ways to get involved are fundraisers, collections at work or by submitting a motion through your union branch. Please get your friends and colleagues together to raise money for people in Calais. This will allow us to make much needed longer-term investments in order to provide electricity and decent sanitary standards to the camp. 
If you would like to get involved on future convoys, please register here.

This leaves about £5348. £2000 covered 400 supply bags typically containing 200g Tuna, 1 tin Kidney Beans, 1 tin Chopped Tomatoes, 1l Long-life Milk, 300g sugar, 250g rice, 200g dates, cereal bars, 20 tea  bags, toothbrush, tooth paste, sanitary items.
£350 was spent on a generator to power a school in the camp, £300 on a water pump to clean up flooding. 
Most of us paid for our own hostel and ferry crossing, a few claimed these from the campaign as it made the difference between them being able to come or not. A typical ferry crossing was £35 return trip. A typical hostel room was £35 per person. Fuel was not covered for any of the vehicles.  We expect to use all of the remaining funds on this trip as we are increasing the content and amount of supply packs we distribute as well as growing the convoy. So please support and share this widely.

story:
Smoking doesn't have to be forever....

Don't you hate it when family members and friends light up a cigarette or vape? Hate the smell, the damage they are doing to their bodies, and the waste of money? Almost all smokers have tried to quit several times, but have failed. Why? Because smoking is as much a mental habit as it is an addiction.

If we approach quitting with a clear plan to change the way our brains think about smoking, we can easily and quickly leave this nasty and expensive habit behind us, and go on to make further changes to our lifestyles like getting fitter and  eating better.

Our unique "Programme in a Box" gives smokers all the tools to change their lives in 15 days.

THE BEYOND NICOTINE  programme  comes in a kit and is a revolutionary way to  help even the hard core smoker to quit easily and permanently because it uses latest science to help smokers change the way our brains think, supported by effective homeopathic anti crave formulas and a body and lung cleansing detox course, and  some really cool downloadable apps too!

Our 15 day programme is very effective, has been awarded a NDC Number and is now available on selected e commerce sites. And this is just the start.



How we will help smokers in the US and the World...

We now intend to take this programme to the almost 50 million smokers in America, and via a Spanish translation reach  many more smokers in Central and South America.

To reach smokers at community level and in the workplace, we plan to train Wellness Practitioners, probably existing therapists, teachers, oral hygienists or psychologists, to present our effective 90 minute Workshops in their towns and counties, effectively boosting their own small businesses with skills that will earn income, and help communities.

Given the disproportionately high rate of smoking in Hispanic communities, help us fund a translation process so the programme may be better used by those that really need the help, in their first language.

Finally, although we have a NDC number and FDA registrations, we need to secure our copyrights, IP and registrations as protection from the giant drug companies and the tobacco industry who will guard their investments.



How we may Thank You

If you contribute $50, we will send a free Beyond Nicotine kit to a smoker of your choice in your name, and send two kits to your smoking family and friends for every $100.

For every contribution of $500 we will stage a free 90 minute quit smoking in the workplace online webinar for the company you work for, throwing in 12 kits for attendees.

For each contribution of $1500 we will invite a nominee of your choice to attend a free Beyond Nicotine Therapists full day training course in Orlando. Here they will learn the techniques of counselling smokers and preparing them to quit.

This will Including training on presentation skills, marketing tips and allow the attendee use of presentation materials and Power Point presentation aid, and sufficient free kits to resell to allow the therapist to make over one thousand Dollars when resold.



The beauty of the Beyond Nicotine approach...

We know smokers really would prefer not to smoke. In fact generally they are sick to death of the whole smoking/quitting cycle. They just don't know how to finally make the move!

If your partner, your parents, your kids or colleagues smoke, you have the power to set them free by introducing to them this novel and very effective psychological and homeopathic combination that changes lives.

The great thing is, this is not a new start-up. We have proven the programme is effective and helped thousands of smokers to realise quitting is an option! 

We have done our homework via legal registrations and health registrations and have manufactured advance stock in the USA.

All we need is to let smokers know the cavalry has arrived.



Risks & Challenges

We are the new kids on the block, small guys with a proven, tested and hugely beneficial product and great intentions.

And we need your help to fund the marketing and expansion of the next stage of this project, confident Beyond Nicotine will soon be a household name.

Our programme really works, it's novel and fun and has helped thousands of smokers start a whole new phase of their lives as confident, proud achievers Beyond Nicotine. Come on, its time to stop the nonsense, smoking is just not an option anymore.



Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the Beyond Nicotine word! Let those close to us who smoke know there is hope. See our product on amazon.com, and with your help, in your local drugstore or pharmacy. Help suitable candidates attend our Quit Smoking Councillor courses, and help their communities to quit the habit.

story:
INTRODUCTION AND BACKGROUND INFORMATION

HUSAMBAE community based organization is a nonprofit making voluntary community. We are based in Kisumu City in the Western region of Kenya, and our work is caring for orphans and vulnerable children, widows and people living with HIV/AIDS and affected by HIV/AIDS. The centre strives to promote the rights and respect for orphans and other vulnerable children, widows, and grandmothers who are the caregivers.

The centre was started in 2007 by Michael Joseph Bole, the Director of the organization after realizing the high poverty rate, a factor which makes the community greatly vulnerable to the HIV scourge. The organization was officially registered as a non profit with the Ministry of Gender, Sport, Culture and Social Services in the year 2008 to carry out it’s duties for supporting the HIV/AIDS orphans, vulnerable children and widows.

The organization acts as resource mobilization strategy to cater for the plight of orphans, widows and PLHIV’s (persons Living With HIV) to address their needs, pioneer their rights, and campaign towards stigma reduction. The role of HUSAMBAE is to respond meaningfully to the impact of HIV/AIDS in the community through health care to access antiretroviral drugs and education for the orphans and vulnerable children we serve.

(Primary students of Husambae (Total Orphans))

(Committee members of widows and their leaders)

Husambae’s target beneficiaries are community members, especially orphans and other vulnerable children, marginalized women, men, youths, faith based Organizations, private Organizations, and Community Based Organizations. Currently we have over 1,200,000 orphans in the county (by the 2012 statistics). 

The Husambae project serves 365 orphans and vulnerable children, and 1815 widows.

(Widows in counselling session) 

(Secondary students that Husambae supports)

(Widows that are supported by organization)                     

(Feeding program for Husambae) 


VISION

Husambae Community Based Organization envisions a community which all children have the opportunity to attain their full potential and contribute to the well being of the family, society and our county.

MISSION

To create a positive change in people’s lives, by partnering with other organizations to implement innovative solutions to critical social, cultural and economic problems.

The project is being implemented with Nyanza province in area of newly created Kisumu County in the Kenya constitution. The catchment area of Husambae project Kisumu East District child link covered in the last five years through laid down strategies such as capacity building on knowledge, skills and communication on facts on HIV/AIDS, social family life education. Outreach programs include counselling services, community group mobilization, home visits, and monitoring and evaluation. Reintegration to the community involves training mentors for care giving and rehabilitation of neglected children.

Husambae Community Based Organization has also been running a widow's empowerment program to enable the children and widows we work with to curb the grievous psychological torture affecting them and to contain the impact of HIV/AIDS at community level.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

Over the past three years, HUSAMBAE has been running a program targeting poor families, people with HIV/AIDS, TB, Malaria and other diseases for orphans, other vulnerable children and widows who have no hope.

We do not have a local clinic for the people we serve to get medication since the nearest Hospital is 215km to reach when patients fall sick; this is a 3.5 hour journey! This has made us lose many lives and it has also been a BIG problem to the whole community that serve.

We need your support to build a local clinic.  We have already consulted with the community, Government departmental, local area administration and all relevant legal departments concerned with health, land and housing. They support the project and all that is needed now is to raise the funds to construct a health clinic. This will allow us to serve our local community through the improvement of our local standard of living conditions of children’s health, psychosocial care, nutrition, education, economic and gender development.

This same project was previously evaluated in August 2008, which helped the project to focus on the right direction so we could be sure to achieve the set goals and objectives. The project had 325 various women groups registered with the Ministry of children, Gender and social Development. The evaluation realized that there was a need to promote mobilization of children with focus on strengthening mentoring process on a structured basis and to initiate an HIV/AIDS program giving them opportunity access basic services. It also diagnosed that there is need to enhanced food security through teaching better methods of farming and each caregiver to establish a kitchen garden in the homestead that will address nutritional status among the children in our district.

(Means of transport)

According to the Millennium Development Goals (MGDs) Agenda 6, HIV/AIDS, TB and malaria should be completely stopped by 2015. An indicator of HIV/AIDS shows that 47% of men and 34% of women had correct knowledge about prevention in 2008. This figure justifies why HUSAMBE keenly focuses its efforts on working with children and women who remain vulnerable. Without new strategies to fight stigma and supplement the livelihoods of the people living with the virus, meeting the Millennium Development Goals would remain elusive.

HUSAMBAE COMMUNITY PROJECT AIM

The project aims to raise a total of KSH 3,247,130 (approx. USD 40,000) for building a health clinic to support the project’s beneficiaries who are widows, orphans and the entire community living with different disease. The project has identified a land and we are even able to start the project now because we have had luck with some initial capital to start the project of clinic.

HOW YOUR MONEY WILL BE USED 

Buying the materials for buildings (estimated cost of KSH 1,247,130)
Paying for the labor for constructors (estimated cost of KSH 200,000)
Buying land for putting up a clinic (estimated cost of KSH 1,800,000) 

OPERATING PLAN

Husambae project has put aside KSH 200,000 to start the project and we have  ready volunteers to work in the project of the clinic when it opens. We have two volunteer nurses and one Doctor and social workers. When we get the money requested for the building of the clinic, we will add to the funds Husambae has already raised and kick off the project as soon as possible.
Husambae project currently has a staff of 18 ready to work in the clinic when it starts operating and these staff will offer management under the leadership of Michael Joseph Bole as the Director. Some will offer medical services like the ready volunteer Doctor, Nurses, social workers, Driver, clinic cleaners, watchman, cooks and others. The clinic will run by involving it's services for clinic to the most beneficiaries whom we care for like widows, orphans and vulnerable children and outpatients whom will pay some money for the services they get from the clinic to make it run and pay it's workers when it starts operation. In the readiness of the money to start the project from well-wishers who support our fundraising, the building of the clinic will take 90 days and possibly we wish to open the clinic by end of December. 

So please take a moment and help our needy now and by spreading this word of fundraising to friends, well-wishers, donors, companies, NGO’S !

(A volunteer nurse of Husambae supports a sick orphan)

(One of the sick widows in the project who could benefit from a local clinic)
