story:
Our Story

Hey. My name is Adam Payne and I am a Leo. I am also a cancer-free, hair growing person. I have never had cancer, but I have experienced it up-close with my friends and with my immediate family. It sucks. I have spent most of my life trying to be the funny guy and make light of the darkest situations; but cancer, cancer sucks.  Cancer, and Breast Cancer in particular, has always been one of those subjects that, for the life of me, I just can't make funny. I can't write a song about it. I can't intimidate it with dance, and I can't punch it into oblivion. Well, I probably could use my super-human strength and punch it into oblivion, but you know Cancer is a sneaky mutha and would just come back from remission. 

I have played music out of the Athens area for 14 years now and in that time; I have played quite a few charitable concerts. I have donated money to American Cancer Society and I have donated three long pony-tails to Locks for Love. I have been asked/ dared to shave my head and in the process raise $500 for BreastFest Athens. This is a dare that I do not take lightly, because as you know, when a musician cuts his hair, he cuts his talent as well...   After very little thought, I have decided that I WILL have my head shaved at BreastFest on March 24 2012, along with the other brave souls that have agreed to do the same. I have started this campaign simply because I know that I have a lot of friends that have been affected by Breast Cancer. I also know that I have a full-time job and have never openly asked any of my friends to give to anything, ever. I'm asking now.


The Impact


Improving the lives of breast cancer patients is at the heart of The Tyanna Foundation which honors a motherâ€™s life, love and living legacy. Tyanna Barre Oâ€™Brien lost her battle with breast cancer in 1990 at the age of 48. Her legacy continues today, embodied by her five daughters. It is their commitment to awareness and prevention that inspires and leads the work of The Tyanna Foundation, a 100% volunteer organization. Hosting a variety of events and fundraising efforts throughout the nation, The Tyanna Foundation has raised over $750,000 since itâ€™s inception in 1998.

All proceeds for the Athens chapter of The Tyanna Foundation are donated to the St. Mary's Women's Diagnostic Center.


What We Need & What You Get

I have to get $500 together for them to even talk to me. I want to get $2000 together for this cause. I will be giving all the money no matter how little or how large to BREASTFEST ATHENS. ALL of this will go directly to St. Mary's Women's Diagnostic Center 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can share this project. You don't have to know who I am, to know who Cancer is and want to help. 


You can come out to Breastfest Athens 2012 at Terrapin Brewery on March 24th. details below.

https://www.facebook.com/events/232899526793164/ 


Enjoy Terrapin beer tastings and brewery tours!

Local music from Bloodkin, Kyshona Armstrong, Adam Payne, Charlie Garrett Band, Deja Vu, Betsy Franck and the Bareknuckle Band, Mark Cunningham and the Nationals, 90 Acre Farm, efren, Betsy Kingston & The Crowns, Chris Moore, Clay Leverett, Dodd Ferrelle, Granfalloons and Athens Showgirls Cabaret! Stay tuned for additions to the line-up.

Food from local restaurants including: 5 Star Day, Amici's, Barberitos, Bretts, Georgia Theater Rooftop, Sisters Creole, Square One and Zaxby's!

Kids activities, raffles, huge silent auction, breast health information, and awesome merchandise!

Pink hair extensions from City Salon!

Local brave people will shave their heads to raise $500 a piece from their friends and family who want to see them do it! 

Tickets are $30 in advance and $35 day of. Kids are FREE!

story:
Our Story

I never asked you for help my friends, but this time i do! 

My 2 girlfriends Nastya ana Yana and my best friend Aselya got into car crush on the night of August 31st. It happened in Kazakhstan on the way to the airport on a bad road - they lost the control of the car, turned over few times, crushed the trees and were thrown to the other side of the road. Nastya was driving and as she was with the belt - she is ok. Yana unfortunately died and Aselya was in coma, has trepanning, pulmonary edema, collapse of bone marrow, numerous of broken bones and breathes with the breathing apparat...

Aselya just turned 25, she is the most loving, sweetest and kindest person I ever met! 

PLEASE!!!HELP ME TO HELP HER!!!EVEN $5 WILL MAKE A DIFFERENCE!

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE! Your financial support and your prayers will help my best friend to get back to normal life!

spread the word and invite all your friends! 

The Impact

It's unknown yet how fast Aselya will get better...She reacts on her name - so it is already good sign!

But she has very few relatives, and her friends are her biggest hope! Economy of the country is not the best - so even $5 will be an impact. The operation and after-operation periods and expenses are huge - we need any help for Aselya - so she could get better without struggling with financial problems.


What We Need & What You Get

i am trying to raise at least $2000 - but the more the better! as the first operations were free since it was emergency. But the rest of the following and specially the after-surgery period will be very hard for Aselya financially. 

Other Ways You Can Help

'Do It With Others' please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign! Get my Aselya back to life!


Updates

sept 6th: Yesterday Aselya's half of the body was paralyzed but today i received email that she moved fingers on both of her hands!
m

story:
Hello and welcome!

Friends of David Sheker AKA CinderVOMIT have started this campaign to raise funds after a series of unfortunate medical mishaps left him with massive bills to pay. Please contribute whatever you can using the big pink button on the right and enjoy some great music in the process!

What happened?

Cinder suffered a “diverticulotis” that ruptured his intestines causing poison and bacteria to spread through his system, almost killing him in the process. Surgeons removed 14 inches of his intestines and Cinder was forced to use a colostomy bag while healing from this initial operation. He has since had to endure additional surgery on his stomach. Although his prognosis is good, this father of two has been saddled with medical bills in excess of $40,000!

Community response

Several groups have formed benefit programs for Cinder. Among them are Akashik Record’s Help Cinder site (also on Facebook) and the JellyFish Frequency Records series of benefit compilations. All of the offerings available through these projects will be provided for supporters of this campaign as well.

About Cinder

Cinder is David Sheker of Atlanta, Georgia. He is the loving husband of Casey and father to two children. He is also a linchpin of the local psychedelic trance scene, having been involved for many years now both on the label side as well as with his projects CinderVOMIT and Datavore. Check out these links for more about his music:

CinderVOMIT discography on Ektoplazm (free downloads)
CinderVOMIT on SoundCloud (streaming)
CinderVOMIT on Facebook

About the team

This is an ad hoc campaign formed by several friends of Cinder to coordinate benefit efforts here on Indiegogo. None of us are taking a cut of the donations; every penny earned will go direct to Cinder’s medical bills (after Indiegogo/Paypal fees are accounted for, of course).

Help Cinder!

Please support with whatever you can! Your help is essential to ensuring that David and his family can recover from this difficult time. Thank you very much!

Direct donations via Paypal to cindablock@gmail.com are also very welcome!

story:
Dear Indiegogo Supporter,

This past year we conducted a case study for people with Parkinson’s with promising results.

I am a neuroendocrine researcher focusing on neurodegenerative issues such as Parkinson’s and Alzheimer’s.

I got a call December 11th from one of the participants in our case studies on Parkinson’s that we started this past April. 

She said, “Now I really have hope and feel I’m not dying from it.” 

A month ago another participant told his doctor, “Thanks for giving me my life back.”  

They and others have been taking a set of our non-prescription neuropeptoide formulas for Parkinson’s that I had been researching and developing since 2009. 

Now we need to conduct a nationwide clinical study.

This feedback in addition to the quantifiable results (please see the end here and visit our www.ParkinsonsSolution.com) from our review of symptoms forms are confirming a steady decrease in symptoms of the participants with Parkinson’s, and with no adverse side effects reported.

Now we need to take it to the next stage and do a nationwide clinical study with at least 100 participants whose doctors recommend them.

We were able to pay for all of the development costs and the case study, but now request your help for this nation-wide study.

Until now I have had to pay for everything out-of-pocket, but with these promising results proving the potential value of our formulas, we need to do a nationwide clinical study with at least 100 participants for 6 months, and then publish a paper of our results.

All the monies received will apply to conducting a nationwide clinical study starting January, 2015.

All of the monies received will be used to cover formula costs for the participants and expenses associated with conducting this study.  For example, just mailing costs for bottles twice to 100 participants by priority mail is: 100 x $5.80 x 2 = $1060, and receiving the doctors’ reports once a month = 100 x 6 x $0.46 = $276.

The amount we hope to receive is $68,000.  The more money received, the more people with Parkinson’s we can enroll in this no-cost study to them. 

Many people are suffering and the urgency is growing.

With over 1,000,000 Americans afflicted with this debilitating, deadly disease and no curative treatments available, the need for our study is crucial. 

The study materials are already developed. 

Doctors from whom we will receive participant referrals are being brought together. 

With your support we plan to start this 6-month study by the end of January, 2015.

Please make a contribution to our study.

I am turning to you to see if you could please help and

(1) make a donation of however much you can and

(2) share this information with your friends, family, and associates.

Please also check out our little affiliated website we set up for this study: www.ParkinsonsSolution.com so that you will be able to stay informed and watch the progress of our study.  To get regular updates on our research findings and participant feedback, please 'like' us on https://www.facebook.com/ParkinsonsSolution. 

Any amount you can contribute, (perhaps at least $20.15 to commemorate the coming year?), will be deeply appreciated by us and especially those afflicted by Parkinson's.  While we don’t have rewards or gifts, please know that you will be a very important part of this ground-breaking research project and kept up-to-date as the study progresses.

Hearth-felt thanks from us and those with Parkinson’s

Thank you so very much for your donation and may you have a blessed Holiday Season and 2015 year.

My best to your good health,

Paul E. Opheim

Research Director

Read on to See how Our March – November Case Studies Show Promising Results

·  Note how the perceived quality of life improved significantly so rapidly.

·  We will continue to update these figures on our website, so please check back periodically.

·  Please also read the testimonials for additional input from study participants.

Testimonials

April, 2014 started Proof-of-Hypothesis Studies for Parkinson’s

 In addition to the Review of Symptoms form documentation, these quotes are unsolicited feedback from the participants.

Report May 1st at 1 month …..   “The other day (husband) told me he thought both his handwriting and his  gait were better. Cautiously optimistic.”

Report Jun 27th at 3 months ….. “I'm already seeing results from the sprays which I am grateful to you for.  

* full restful sleep without waking (went on for years)

* no more nightmares of people and animals trying to kill me  

 * no more constipation (went on for years)

* no more head tremor

* no more leg cramps (went on for years)

* less severe anxiety and mild depression (went on for years)

            (all physiological domains are better …)

* better memory and mood

Overall--my "cylinders" are running together which gives me the ability to function better.  One huge motor symptom that has not reoccurred is a head tremor.  I had a head tremor going all the time for four months without medication until I started taking levadopa.  Even when I'm unmedicated, the head tremor is gone for good now!  I attribute this motor change to your sprays.

Report July 10th at 3 months ..…“I had no trouble buttoning my blouse this morning.  I was very happy    about that.”

Report Aug 1st at 4 months:  ….. “I had lunch with my daughter today and she said, "mom I  think you are  walking better and swinging your arms better too". So that is very good  news.”

Report Aug 21st at 4 months:  ….. “Thanks for giving me my life back.”

 Report Aug 25th at 5 months:  ….. “I keep improving, but still shake – more in the evenings.”

Report Oct 8, 2014 at 7 months:  ….. "I want to take a little time to thank both of you for the work you are doing.  I just returned from my neurologist, and the disease is at the very least slowing down in its progression.  In fact, I think it has stopped at least for now and a number of my symptoms have even improved! 

When I was first diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease at the age of 41, I was on one hand very happy to finally be diagnosed correctly after a tough diagnostic process.  I was diagnosed in Stage 2 Parkinson's in Feb. of 2012, and I'm still in stage 2 today.  After six months, I was scared when I finally knew what I was dealing with.  I'm not scared any more.  With your permission, I would like to continue the sprays indefinitely.  I think they are the only hope I have to at least slow down, stop, or even improve the disease along with regular exercise, a proper diet, staying active and positive, and prayer. 

There is nothing else out there like your sprays.  I am so grateful to you, and so is my family.  I have three kids to finish raising and work that I want to keep doing.  I will do anything to advocate for you and let others know how much your sprays have helped me.  I want to keep going!"

Report Dec 12th at 9 months:  ….. “Now I really have hope and feel I’m not dying from it.”
story_txt:
Dear Indiegogo Supporter,
This past year we conducted a case
study for people with Parkinson’s with promising results.
I am a neuroendocrine researcher focusing on
neurodegenerative issues such as Parkinson’s and Alzheimer’s.
I got a call December 11th from one of the participants in our
case studies on Parkinson’s that we started this past April.  
She said, “Now I really have hope and feel I’m not
dying from it.”  
A month ago another participant told his doctor, “Thanks
for giving me my life back.”  
They and others have been taking a set of our
non-prescription neuropeptoide formulas for Parkinson’s that I had been researching and
developing since 2009.  
Now we need to
conduct a nationwide clinical study.
This feedback in addition to the quantifiable results (please see the end here and visit our www.ParkinsonsSolution.com) from our review of symptoms forms are confirming a steady
decrease in symptoms of the participants with Parkinson’s, and with no adverse
side effects reported.
Now we need to take it to the next stage and do a nationwide
clinical study with at least 100 participants whose doctors recommend them.
We were able to pay
for all of the development costs and the case study, but now request your help
for this nation-wide study.
Until now I have had to pay for everything out-of-pocket, but with
these promising results proving the potential value of our formulas, we need to
do a nationwide clinical study with at least 100 participants for 6 months, and then publish a paper of our results.
All the monies received
will apply to conducting a nationwide clinical study starting January, 2015.
All of the monies received will be used to cover formula
costs for the participants and expenses associated with conducting this study.  For example, just mailing costs for bottles twice to
100 participants by priority mail is: 100 x $5.80 x 2 = $1060, and receiving the doctors’ reports once a month =
100 x 6 x $0.46 = $276.
The amount we hope to receive is $68,000.  The more money received, the more people with
Parkinson’s we can enroll in this no-cost study to them.  
Many people are
suffering and the urgency is growing.
With over 1,000,000 Americans afflicted with this debilitating,
deadly disease and no curative treatments available, the need for our study is
crucial.  
The study materials are already developed.  
Doctors from whom we will receive participant referrals are
being brought together.  
With your support we plan to start this 6-month study by the
end of January, 2015.
Please make a
contribution to our study.
I am turning to you to see if you could please help and
(1) make a donation of however much you can and 
(2) share this information with your friends, family, and
associates.
Please also check out our little affiliated website we set
up for this study: www.ParkinsonsSolution.com
so that you will be able to stay informed and watch the progress of our study.  To get regular updates on our research findings and participant feedback, please 'like' us on https://www.facebook.com/ParkinsonsSolution. 
Any amount you can contribute, (perhaps at least $20.15 to commemorate the coming year?), will be deeply appreciated by us and especially those afflicted by Parkinson's.  While we don’t have rewards or gifts, please know that you will be a very
important part of this ground-breaking research project and kept up-to-date as the study progresses.
Hearth-felt thanks
from us and those with Parkinson’s
Thank you so very much for your donation and may you have a
blessed Holiday Season and 2015 year.
My best to your good health,
Paul E. Opheim
Research DirectorRead on to See how Our March
– November Case Studies Show Promising Results

story:
Why You Need to Help

About 14 million Pakistanis suffer from Mental Illnesses.

In urban centres like Karachi alone, this number is as high as 6 million people

That's 14 million people in need of YOUR help.

14 million people with very little access to Mental Health and almost no access to finding their way back to a normal, productive life.

Imagine the social impact you can have by helping just one person find normalcy. 


Who are We?

CareForHealth aims to become a registered and established NGO in Pakistan, filling a critical gap in Pakistan's Mental Health infrastructure.

Click Here To Go to our Website

See the 11 min documentary on our work below


What do we Do?

In terms of Mental Health, Pakistan is one of the worst effected developing countries, Mental Health is greatly misunderstood in Pakistan and is a taboo subject.

Due to social stigma, people with Mental illness (Depression, Bipolar Disorder, Schizophrenia, and Anxiety) find it nearly impossible to become a part of mainstream society, even after they have been treated.

CFH aims to give sufferers their life back.

We work with Hospitals, Industry and Vocational Institutes to ensure that patients are rehabilitated properly and are then given jobs to ensure they are re-integrated into society.

This is no mean feat. And we need YOUR help to make it a success.

How do we do it?

We do this by providing:

  • Counselling for patients referred to us by hospitals - this is a 9-12 month rehabilitation program to ensure the patient has fully recovered.
  • Training new practitioners to expand our outreach.
  • Raising Awareness in workplaces. This will be expanded into awareness and outreach programs for neighbourhoods and families.
  • Re-Integration into society by improving our network in Industry and Training Institutes. We ensure each willing person has a job placement along with regular followups from our team to mark progress, thereby adding to his well-being and setting them on the path to complete recovery.
We have been doing this voluntarily since 2012 and now it’s time to make a larger mark & expand our reach.

How can YOU help?

Re-educating a society on Mental Health and Re-integrating people back to being their productive best is no easy task.

We have broken down the funds we need to expand & continue our work.

A total of $10,000 will take us through this fiscal year as we aim to:

  • Rehabilitate & Reintegrate at least 40 people this year.
  • Hire & Train 4 new practitioners.
  • Awareness Campaigns (seminars, brochures, ads, etc)
  • Outreach Campaigns (industry networking, hospital affiliations, etc)

Our campaign target is $6,000 to ensure we have funds for the coming 7 months - but in no way should you stop donating even if our target is reached.

Just $250 can mean that you've helped one person and his whole family find normalcy again.

We need your help:

  • Donate! 
  • Tell others to Donate!
  • Share!
  • Make your organization a Networking Partner with CFH (contact info@careforhealth.com or alizeh@careforhealth.co or lalarukh@careforhealth.co)

Zakat?

If you are paying any part of your Zakat to us, then please leave a comment saying this money is for "Zakat". 
We will then ensure your money is going towards our Zakat eligible clients only.

story:
Hello all

Excuse the mass mailout but this coming Saturday, I'm doing a mini triathlon near The Shard to raise funds for the nearby Guy's Hospital's new Cancer Centre. Below are the deets of both the race and the cause, any support - no matter how great or small - would be greatly appreciated. (I also want to point out that the night prior is dear friend, Rali's bday with a lot of tequila tempting me so this is going to be extra painful but for a good cause.)

Cause: Inaugural Guy's Urban Challenge - target is to make GBP15 million total to fund the operations of Guy's Hospital's new Cancer Centre - Dr Majid Kazmi, clinical director of cancer services at Guy's and St Thomas', said: "The new cancer centre at Guy's promises to be a truly world-class facility for cancer patients in south east London and beyond. By bringing together treatment and research, we will be able to provide the best and latest treatments for patients."

What I'm commiting to: a 2.4km run, then jump on a static Wattbike for a 15km cycle and finish with a stair climb to the 29th floor of The Shard.

They have asked that we each ideally raise GBP200 but any contribution I can give will make it worthwhile so I kindly ask for any support - in monetary terms and/or if you just want to cheer us on, on the day :) it doesn't matter the donation, every little will help. BTW, the min this site let me put was US$500 but ignore that, the goal is GBP200. 

I'll be sure to send a few pictures of my sweaty face after the race - wish me luck!!

Ania x

story:
You can go to http://allairgoo.mobi to download our application to get personalized alerts about air pollution ...

french speaking? vous voulez du français ? regardez ici.

Allairgoo: Air pollution & Pollen alerts

The air pollution is an increasingly important issue in developed countries. Everyone looks at CO2 and climate while other problems exist and involve a larger number of people breathing a polluted air by particles and gases produced by cars, industries.

In fact on some places, Not all air is good for breathing ! 

Air pollution causes cancer.  Just have look at this map that shows the premature mortality due to air pollution:


source : Nasa study.

Asthma is the most common chronic disease that affects Americans of all ages, about 40 million people . Asthmatic people are affected by this pollution, and must take care. To achieve this, they have to be informed correctly at time and adapt their behavior.. Sometimes for days.


Allairgoo  is designed to help Everyone who wants to live better, who wants healthier lives in a more and more polluted environment. Well informed you will suffer less and adapt your behavior to stay healthy. 

Allairgoo is designed to help every one, to understand what means technical information about pollution , AQI, µg/m3 of Ozone on their wealth. Without need of engineering or scientific degrees or wikipedia.

Allairgoo (TM) is a project that consists of a system of personalized alerts for allergy and asthma sufferers and ignorant victims of pollution episodes more frequent in OECD countries and south-west Asia, main Chinese cities…

Example: in New Zealand , one in four kid before 10 years  became asthmatic in Auckland following episodes of pollution. While the country has beautiful scenery for the Hollywood productions .

22 million allergic, 5 million asthmatics in France undergo episodes of air pollution at the same time and sometimes trigger new allergies (studies about PM role in allergic development). Their daily life (or night) and their work are then hit in a different way according to their level of sensitivity  or reaction to pollutant (PM, NOx, Ozone). 

The problems are identical for people in the USA, UE, biggest cities in China… It affects children, young adults, adults, old people.

They do not have simple alerts despite existing technologies and no comprehensible system of alert and responsive to the needs of each. Each of you does not answer, or react the same way than another. (UK Study 2009) 


Covered cities in the USA:


We have the same coverage for Europe, Australia and China, Singapour, Hong-Kong.

China:

Australia 


 Europe (at launch time, more cities to come)



DESIGNED FOR :

  • Allergic, asthmatics.
  • Quantified self gurus
  • sportsman, sportswomen, athletes, trainers : most of them ignore that running or training under bad (and invisible) conditions is dangerous for their health.
  • parents who want to protect their children : "Parent" version for parents who want to alert their children.

We offer a simple solution via their smartphone: a subscription to a PERSONALIZED alert service with a low cost : 12€/year or 15 US $ .

With Allairgoo, you can choose when you receive notification alerts. 

It therefore concerns the preservation of health by allowing customers and users to change their behavior if the episode level concerns them . It is about getting older healthy as these problems affect henceforth ages people and affect life expectancy . Allairgoo plays on the well-being of all including sportsperson and well-being at home, and allows adjustment of lifestyle and hygienic behaviors.

Based on public data (1000 cities available about 800 millions of adults payers , and based on european or US medical estimations : 200 millions of potential users ) via proprietary algorithms we define a personalized threshold for each client: Empowerment and quantize yourself!

The more you use Allairgoo the more the algorithm learns about you.

All in a simple ergonomics user interface comparable to that of an application comparable to a weather-like app with a pedagogy of events , a small  number of screens, a "free" mode apparently not limited in terms of functionalities . 

This a freemium model. The free app offers all the functionalities , the customer registers , creates his account on our platform, is informed  on public thresholds & pollution alerts or pollen alerts (on larger zone) . The software will determine its personal threshold . 

But this personal threshold is not saved on the iPhone/android ( paid version only ), and the free version will lack of some other internal functionalities. And you will be alerted even if you move to another country (holidays, work), city covered by our service.

Allairgoo will alert you on your iPhone/Android phone at the time you want. 

People should be able to use Allairgoo easily and immediately, without training and without reading a user manual.

For this, the only device you need is a recent smatphone (IOS, Android) , no box, no über-modern watch on you, no home device.. and you.

But for people in zone where no datas are available or not available for the public, We will also sell a device for the customer that provides the level of PM10/PM2.5 micro-particles ( dust ) and ozone / nitrogen oxides at home, work, or any place where the device is installed  (even outside with additional furniture  ). 

Target price : 120  to 150 € (internal model)

It connects to the LAN of the client, and will need a PC / Mac or tablet / smartphone that enables it to manage and archive the datas and send them on a centralized server, which among other displays Google Map software. It will user OS/X or windows possibility of " alerting " or notifications of any kind , and on some DSL/Fiber devices/boxes and use the possibility to send messages on the screen of the TV or directly on the connected IP TV .

It is conceived to use a little bandwidth payload so it can be connected thru 2G network, edge connexions.

Target : power users, data gurus, open data revolutionaries, rural zones, low developed countries.

Key features

Logging : anonymous datas, no spam, full UE regulatory compliant.

LANGUAGE

Software will be available in English, French, Chinese and Spanish.

THE STORY BEHIND:

The project concerns me personally, I am a victim of air pollution (asthma) in addition to allergies. My case is identical to that of millions of people in the OECD and other countries.

My professional background goes from system administrator, computer system engineer and design services. I worked as a project manager for various companies including Fortune 500 index companies. I master in functional design, market research & studies, search for open data sources, modeling algorithms, data processing, study technical architecture and functional design of the application ..

With your help, we can: 

Manufacture the Box in the 2 versions and get all approvals needed to ship it. Develop all the  Android and iOS platforms.

Stretch Goal

5 000 $ with leverage we can borrow 5 times this amount and build the APPs, test the prototype with happy few users.

10 000 $ : we can borrow more money, and test its industrial production.

25 000 $ : we can borrow more money, and produce the box.

All this with a french touch.

Links :

Have a question about our project? discuss on crowdfundingForum

Merci.


UPDATE :

a preview of the alerting system , here with a parent and 2 children.

in this case, the parent is informed that our system has sent 2 alerts to the smartphones of his children. It will use his words (selected via his "parental mode"), because they are more efficient than other.

a preview of the main interface in advanced mode, here in Los Angeles, USER CASE : the personal threshold for the pollutant "NOx" nitrogen dioxide is in RED, that means that an alert has been sent via notification on his phone for this at the time the user decided to.

Asthma is the most common chronic disease that affects Americans of all ages, about 40 million people . Asthmatic people are affected by this pollution, and must take care. To achieve this, they have to be informed correctly at time and adapt their behavior.. Sometimes for days.




Allairgoo  is designed to help Everyone who wants to live better, who wants healthier lives in a more and more polluted environment. Well informed you will suffer less and adapt your behavior to stay healthy. 
Allairgoo is designed to help every one, to understand what means technical information about pollution , AQI, µg/m3 of Ozone on their wealth. Without need of engineering or scientific degrees or wikipedia.


Allairgoo (TM) is a project that consists of a system of personalized alerts for allergy and asthma sufferers and ignorant victims of pollution episodes more frequent in OECD countries and south-west Asia, main Chinese cities…
Example: in New Zealand , one in four kid before 10 years  became asthmatic in Auckland following episodes of pollution. While the country has beautiful scenery for the Hollywood productions .
22 million allergic, 5 million asthmatics in France undergo episodes of air pollution at the same time and sometimes trigger new allergies (studies about PM role in allergic development). Their daily life (or night) and their work are then hit in a different way according to their level of sensitivity  or reaction to pollutant (PM, NOx, Ozone). 


The problems are identical for people in the USA, UE, biggest cities in China… It affects children, young adults, adults, old people.
They do not have simple alerts despite existing technologies and no comprehensible system of alert and responsive to the needs of each. Each of you does not answer, or react the same way than another. (UK Study 2009) 

Covered cities in the USA:




We have the same coverage for Europe, Australia and China, Singapour, Hong-Kong.


China:



Australia 




 Europe (at launch time, more cities to come)






DESIGNED FOR :

Allergic, asthmatics.
Quantified self gurus
sportsman, sportswomen, athletes, trainers : most of them ignore that running or training under bad (and invisible) conditions is dangerous for their health.
parents who want to protect their children : "Parent" version for parents who want to alert their children.

We offer a simple solution via their smartphone: a subscription to a PERSONALIZED alert service with a low cost : 12€/year or 15 US $ .
With Allairgoo, you can choose when you receive notification alerts. 

It therefore concerns the preservation of health by allowing customers and users to change their behavior if the episode level concerns them . It is about getting older healthy as these problems affect henceforth ages people and affect life expectancy . Allairgoo plays on the well-being of all including sportsperson and well-being at home, and allows adjustment of lifestyle and hygienic behaviors.
Based on public data (1000 cities available about 800 millions of adults payers , and based on european or US medical estimations : 200 millions of potential users ) via proprietary algorithms we define a personalized threshold for each client: Empowerment and quantize yourself!
The more you use Allairgoo the more the algorithm learns about you.
All in a simple ergonomics user interface comparable to that of an application comparable to a weather-like app with a pedagogy of events , a small  number of screens, a "free" mode apparently not limited in terms of functionalities . 
This a freemium model. The free app offers all the functionalities , the customer registers , creates his account on our platform, is informed  on public thresholds & pollution alerts or pollen alerts (on larger zone) . The software will determine its personal threshold . 
But this personal threshold is not saved on the iPhone/android ( paid version only ), and the free version will lack of some other internal functionalities. And you will be alerted even if you move to another country (holidays, work), city covered by our service.
Allairgoo will alert you on your iPhone/Android phone at the time you want. 
People should be able to use Allairgoo easily and immediately, without training and without reading a user manual.
For this, the only device you need is a recent smatphone (IOS, Android) , no box, no über-modern watch on you, no home device.. and you.
But for people in zone where no datas are available or not available for the public, We will also sell a device for the customer that provides the level of PM10/PM2.5 micro-particles ( dust ) and ozone / nitrogen oxides at home, work, or any place where the device is installed  (even outside with additional furniture  ). 
Target price : 120  to 150 € (internal model)
It connects to the LAN of the client, and will need a PC / Mac or tablet / smartphone that enables it to manage and archive the datas and send them on a centralized server, which among other displays Google Map software. It will user OS/X or windows possibility of " alerting " or notifications of any kind , and on some DSL/Fiber devices/boxes and use the possibility to send messages on the screen of the TV or directly on the connected IP TV .
It is conceived to use a little bandwidth payload so it can be connected thru 2G network, edge connexions.
Target : power users, data gurus, open data revolutionaries, rural zones, low developed countries.
Key features
Logging : anonymous datas, no spam, full UE regulatory compliant.
LANGUAGE
Software will be available in English, French, Chinese and Spanish.
THE STORY BEHIND:
The project concerns me personally, I am a victim of air pollution (asthma) in addition to allergies. My case is identical to that of millions of people in the OECD and other countries.
My professional background goes from system administrator, computer system engineer and design services. I worked as a project manager for various companies including Fortune 500 index companies. I master in functional design, market research & studies, search for open data sources, modeling algorithms, data processing, study technical architecture and functional design of the application ..
With your help, we can: 
Manufacture the Box in the 2 versions and get all approvals needed to ship it. Develop all the  Android and iOS platforms.
Stretch Goal
5 000 $ with leverage we can borrow 5 times this amount and build the APPs, test the prototype with happy few users.
10 000 $ : we can borrow more money, and test its industrial production.
25 000 $ : we can borrow more money, and produce the box.
All this with a french touch.
Links :
Have a question about our project? discuss on crowdfundingForum
Merci.

UPDATE :
a preview of the alerting system , here with a parent and 2 children.

in this case, the parent is informed that our system has sent 2 alerts to the smartphones of his children. It will use his words (selected via his "parental mode"), because they are more efficient than other.
a preview of the main interface in advanced mode, here in Los Angeles, USER CASE : the personal threshold for the pollutant "NOx" nitrogen dioxide is in RED, that means that an alert has been sent via notification on his phone for this at the time the user decided to.

story:
Short Summary

Total Water is a ministry within Great Commission Latin America.  Our current  project is located 5km to the south of Danli, El Paraiso, Honduras in a community of close to 1,000 people named Urrutia.   Members of this community were completely displaced due to the floods of 2009 and 2010 in Honduras.  The local government provided the land and construction materials to construct a new community if the members provided the labor.  The houses were constructed, but none of the basic services that were promised including water and sanitation.  The current well is currently located below the community which allows for a high risk of contamination of the water source due to lack of wastewater treatment in the community.  This type of situation is relatively common in rural Honduras as there are still 1.6 million people without any form of wastewater treatment. 

Oscar was left on the street to starve with his sister until their now mother and father picked them up and adopted them when they barely had anything themselves. His mother told us, 'I couldn't just leave them to starve to death.' He and his sister are both very small because they were malnourished but they are super smart, full of energy, and loved deeply. Children around the world miss 443 million school days a year due to water issues. This project can significantly help to give kids in the community like a Oscar a much better life

The Need

We need $85,000 in total for the entire project that will serve a community of 1,000 people.  We currently have $14,000 and have a goal to raise an additional $15,000 in honor of World Water Day.

Total Project Budget:


The Impact

The goal of this project is to develop a sewer system to collect the wastewater and construct a centralized treatment system.   The system will be low maintenance, sustainable, and the community leaders will be trained on operation and maintenance.  The community members will be helping to provide the labor for this project including laying piping and constructing manholes for the sewer network.  The community will also receive hygiene classes encompassing proper water storage and proper hand washing to complete the full scope of our vision of water, sanitation, and hygiene in the community.  This system will protect the community's water source and significantly reduce some of the current diseases in the community including Dengue Fever and Chikungunya that are mosquito-transmitted.  It will also help to prevent diarrheal diseases and parasites caused by the lack of sanitation facilities.  This project will have an impact on 1,000 people.  If you would like to read more on how the lack of sanitation facilities can affect all areas of life visit: www.totalwater.org

View of the community from the water tank.

Risks & Challenges

One of the current challenges we can predict and are currently experiencing is construction cannot commence until the project is almost completely funded.  This causes issues with community development and involvement as they can continue to become discouraged about the project the longer it takes for all of the funding to be obtained.

story:
About me

 

 

My name is Chordale Booker.  I am 21 years old and have been pursing my dream for 3 years now.  Boxing has had a positive influence on me.  I don’t think that I would be where I am today if it wasn’t for boxing. 

Before I began my boxing career, I ran into some trouble with the police.  It was definitely a down point in my life and I believe it was then that I realized that I needed to change, which is when I turned to boxing. Starting boxing was one of the best decisions I could have made in my life.  

I began training with the RF Youth Boxing Program in Oct. 2009.  Boxing has always been something I was interested in despite my basketball career in high school.  When I realized that this was truly my passion and something that I wanted to pursue, it became my main focus.  I was in the gym day and night trying to master what I learned that day in class.  This is when Ahmad Mickens, Revolution Fitness owner, took a particular interest in me.  He noticed that I was working really hard and began training me himself.  

 

My Trainer

I look at Ahmad as a role model and father figure today. My father passed away prior to me starting boxing and Ahmad definitely helped me overcome that challenge. He was someone who despite my background believed in me.  He believed in me, more than I believed in myself at times.  He pushed me beyond my limits with his unconditional support. He taught me how to be disciplined and coachable.  We have built a relationship based on trust, respect, hard-work, and dedication; a relationship that has allowed us to become a winning team.  Since then I have graduated from the RF Youth Program and have become a certified boxing coach and personal trainer.   

 

My Accomplishments

Although I have had a short boxing career, I must say I am really proud of how far I have come. I have won many championships including The Elite Heat Championship, The Adidas Pal Championship, The Pure Breed Championship, The Long Island Championship, Connecticut and New England Golden Glove Championships.  Winning all of those championships boosted my confidence and made me really ambitious. 

 

My Setback

Everything was going great for me until I fought at Revolution Fitness's annual Fall Fisticuffs on November 24, 2012.  It was the first time I fought in my city in a long time and I was excited. During the second round of my fight I broke my ankle and had to forfeit the fight.  It was just so depressing; competing in my city and this happens? I was filled with mixed emotions and could only hope for the best.  I was rushed to the emergency room to find out that I needed surgery and had to be out of the gym for two months.  The recovery process was difficult at first. I was in physical pain but, the mental anguish of not being able to do what I love most was worse.

 

My Comeback

I knew that the best thing I could do was try to fully recover, so that I could box at my highest potential again. Once I came back my motto was "NO PAIN NO GAIN!"  I was training harder than ever for my first fight back, after my injury at the Olympic Center in Lake Placid, NY.  All of my hard work paid off when I won and became the Northeast Region 1 Champion.  

 

What's NEXT

NEXT are the Nationals in Washington State! We are asking for everyone's help to raise $3,000 to cover the cost of the trip.  Region 1 has paid for most of my expenses, but none of my coach's expenses.  Ahmad coaches me at no charge, while running a gym and providing for his family. A week away for the gym and the cost of traveling to the Nationals will definitely put a strain on his business. Not only is he my boxing coach but, he is my life coach and his presence is crucial for my success. 

If you never chase your dreams, you will never catch them and we need your support.  

 

What We Need & What You Get

What are the funds going towards:
  • Travel Expenses
  • Lodging Expenses
  • Trainer Expenses

What you get:

  • Donate $25- Peronal Thank You card
  • Donate $50- Personal Thank you card & Tshirt
  • Donate $75- Personal Thank you card, Tshirt, & An Autographed photo
 

Other ways you can help

 SPREAD THE WORD

 
Like us on Facebook - Revolution Fitness
 
Follow us on Twitter- @thegift7curse & @RevolutionCT

story:
James aka "Hawk" (as many of us know him best) has been an incredible friend, father, and husband for his wife Becky, sons James, Shane and daughter Ashley. Anyone who has known Hawk knows he is the kindest and most energetic person you'd ever meet. You would rarely ever see him without a smile on his face. His love for physical fitness has been his life's passion. He fought a strong fight, working out regularly throughout his treatment process and up until a month ago. No doubt the good Lord will have a weight room with a loaded rack waiting for him in heaven!

We are asking for any financial contributions you are able to give in order to help Becky with medical and inevitably funeral expenses. You may use this site to make those contributions, by using a credit card or Pay Pal. If you aren't able to give monetarily, you can contribute by spreading the word about this site and/or sharing the link to this site.  

Your contributions and efforts are greatly appreciated.

With love,

His dear friends at Paradise Fitness at Carillon Beach, Panama City Beach, FL.

story:
About Sofia...

Sofia Kuchynska was born on the 20th of May in 2008.  Suffering from acute lymphoblastic leukemia, the little Ukrainian girl is a victim  of the consequences of Chernobyl. In her country she is judged to be incurable.

@uxilia has returned to Sofia hope in the future, dreams and desires. Sofia’s blood is white. She’s born close to Chernobyl, after the 26 of April 1986. After the explosion of the reactor number 4 of the nuclear power plant.

After the first cycle of chemotherapy in Ukraine, her illness seemed to be
eradicated, but it came back. Sofia’s fate was appointed.
Ukraine government does not allow a second treatment for children who
relapse after the first cycle. So we, from @uxilia, got going immediately .
In a few days, Sofia started medical treatments at Hospital Burlo Garofolo of Trieste.

_________________________________________________________________________

Sofia Kuchynska è nata il 20 maggio 2008. Affetta da leucemia acuta linfoblastica, la bimba ucraina è vittima  delle conseguenze di Chernobyl. Nel suo Paese è considerata incurabile. 

@uxilia ha ridato a Sofia la speranza nel futuro, nei sogni e nei desideri. 

Il sangue di Sofia è bianco. E' nata vicino a Chernobyl dopo il 26 aprile 1986, dopo l’esplosione del reattore n.4 della centrale nucleare. Sottoposta al primo ciclo di chemioterapia in Ucraina sembrava che la malattia fosse stata sconfitta, invece si è ripresentata. Il destino di Sofia era segnato. Lo stato ucraino non prevede un secondo trattamento per i bambini recidivi alla malattia. Così noi di Auxilia ci siamo attivati subito. In pochi giorni inizia i suoi trattamenti all'Ospedale Burlo Garofalo di Trieste. 


What We Need 

Theraphy is very expensive. She has been subject to a cycle of radiation
therapy and a second cycle of chemotherapy. In the end, a donor was found:
only a bone marrow transplant will give her the chance of survive.

In those three months of isolation after the transplant, she greets us
through the glass, in her bedroom. Three months during which she spends her
time drawing, building paper cranes, watching cartoons on TV and calling
her father and brother, who she can not meet anymore.

Crowdfunding will cover only a part of the costs for the therapy, that we
already paid. Money are not enough. The total amount to save Sofia is 130.000 euro. 

We have to pay living expenses and transfer from Ukraine, the donor search, the cycles of chemotherapy and radiotherapy, hospitalization, medical check-ups, medicines, bone marrow transplant.
_________________________________________________________________________

La cura è molto costosa, viene sottoposta a un ciclo di radioterapia, un secondo ciclo di chemioterapia e infine viene trovato il donatore: solo il trapianto di midollo osseo infatti le darà la possibilità di sopravvivere. Nei tre mesi di isolamento dopo il trapianto ci saluta attraverso il vetro della sua cameretta, tre mesi nei quali passa il tempo a disegnare, costruire gru di carta, guardare i cartoni animati e chiamare il papà e il fratello che non ha potuto più rivedere. 

Il crowdfunding coprirà solo alcune spese della terapia che abbiamo anticipato.  Ma i soldi non sono sufficienti. L'importo totale per salvare Sofia è di 130.000 euro. 

Abbiamo da sostenere le spese di trasferimento dall'Ucraina, la ricerca del donatore, i cicli di chemio e radioterapia, la degenza in ospedale, i controlli medici, i farmaci e ovviamente l'operazione di trapianto del midollo osseo. 


Children after nuclear disaster

Children like Sofia in Ukraine are considered incurable. Sofia’s making it, but
we keep on folding the cranes and fighting, so the children with the white blood can recover and keep on running. 

Adult still believe in paper cranes and wishes. What about you?

_________________________________________________________________________

I bambini come Sofia in Ucraina sono giudicati incurabili. Sofia ce la stafacendo ma noi continuiamo a costruire le gru di carta e a lottare perché altri, tanti bambini col sangue bianco possano guarire e continuare a correre. 

I grandi non credono alle gru e ai desideri. E tu?


  • VISIT OUR WEBSITE_click here
  • THE LEGEND OF SADAKO

THE LEGEND OF SADAKO

story:
'Then I heard the voice of the Lord saying, "Whom shall I send? And who will go for us?" And I said, "Here am I. Send me!" 
Isaiah 6:8
I have been both blessed and honored with the opportunity of participating in a Women's Health medical mission to the Dominican Republic in October through the Nurse Midwifery program at University of Indianapolis. Many of you have asked how you can help. Our purpose is to provide prenatal, labor, delivery and postpartum care along with newborn care to the women and children of La Romana. We will be performing long-awaited gynecological surgeries and also leading the health education portion of a weekend-long Women's Retreat. We will specifically be teaching natural family planning techniques, menopause management, human trafficking awareness and prevention, infant and child CPR, & pregnancy nutrition. The total cost of attendance for this weekend retreat is $30 for each local woman and includes all food, hotel lodging, pampering, fellowship, education & restoration. Your donation will allow a Domincan woman to attend this retreat. Any donations that exceed the need for the retreat will go directly to purchasing supplies for the Dominican women and children, specifically infant care supplies and women's healthcare needs.

Above all, please prayerfully remember our group as we prepare for this trip. Please pray for the refining of our hearts  and for great impact as we near our departure date of October 10th. 

Follow our group by liking our Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/UIndyDominicanMission

story:
Serious As a Heart Attack... My Story 

  It was a snowy day in March of 2007. There was over a foot of snow in the driveway and none of us could get out to go to work. The van got stuck and we burned out the transmission rocking it back and forth. The other car made it out of the driveway but slid into the ditch in front of the house. Needless to say none of us where going to able to get to work.

  When I got back into into the house my chest was fealing full. I thought I had a case of bronchitis because I was out in the cold so long (a couple of hours). We did manage to get my car out and I drove to a nearby clinic.

  At the clinic they took me in right away. They said you don't have bronchitis you are having a heart attack. Off to the hospital they rushed me. On the operating table... I died. They had to use the defibrillator 5 times to get me going again.

  That was over seven years ago and I have come a long way, by the grace of God, to a much healthier me. From barely being able to walk 50 feet with out having to catch my breath to being able to run errands, can walk around WalMart for hours shopping with no problem. Have lost weight, quit eating junk food, stop drinking diet-Pepsi (I was drinking over 8 to 10 20oz per day). Now I eat healthy food every day and all my Doctors say I am doing great keep up the good work.

My name is John Kirst and that is my story.

My goals for this campaign are:

  • To purchase a new or used computer with Windows 7 or 8 so I can work at home. Most telecommuting jobs require that you have a upgraded system. My current system is Windows XP on a slower computer. I cannot work at a 9 to 5 punch the time clock type job quite yet. 
  • By earning more I can come off social security and give more to people who need help. There are a lot of people here at Indiegogo as well as other organizations that need help. I will Pay it Forward 


What the Funds Will Be Used For

The first $500 raised will used to replace my computer. I am currently running Windows XP and this computer cannot be upgraded to Windows 7 or 8. Being on social security income there not a lot of room in the budget for extras. So being able work with a Windows 7 or 8 computer will enable me to work from home thus getting off social security.

Any funds above the $500 will be greatly appreciated and will be used to help support the American Heart Association and My Fellow Indiegogoens in their campaign quests... Pay It Forward. 

 


The Perks You Get

Perk 1 for $5

You Get Great Big Thank You and an Internet Hug 
Perk 2 for $10
I will send you a hand written card
Perk 3 for $25

You get a refrigerator magnet with the logo Love Your Heart Eat Healthy. A good reminder to choose wisely.

Perk 4 for $50
You get to choose a coffee mug, a baseball cap or a t-shirt.


Perk 5 for $100
You get a combo of two perks. Like the baseball cap and t-shirt combo or maybe the coffee mug and the refrigerator magnet combo. You decide! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out about this campaign let others know

Use the Indiegogo share tools

Thanks Again Gogos For Your Help

 

John

story:
Hi, my name is Allison and I am raising money to donate a
Gift That Takes Flight through Stars Air Ambulance for my best friend's dad who
was recently transported with them. As Stars runs solely on donations I am
hoping to raise enough donations to cover the cost of an average flight. Once we fund a flight, they will send a certificate of support and the information about the emergency response. It will mean a lot to me to know that we could help fund a flight to help someone else like they helped my best friend’s dad.

The average cost of a flight is $5,400, and every donation
is going to Stars, for a gift that takes flight.

Donations made to Stars enables them to be ready 24 hours a
day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year to help anyone in need, with 3 bases in
Alberta 2 in Saskatchewan and one in Manitoba.

story:
Holistic or Alternative Medicine is a system of medicine that focuses on treating the whole individual and the prevention of illness via the use of non-toxic, natural therapies. As healthcare costs continue to skyrocket out of control, and consumers deal with the cost and side effects of prescription drugs, there is a tremendous need for natural, non-toxic alternative choices. 

Natural MD Search wants to be the go-to website for people seeking to learn about alternative medicine treatments and alternative medicine remedies and to locate an Alternative Healthcare Provider. The site focuses on providing information about specific complementary, holistic and alternative forms of healing, holistic and alternative views on health conditions, and the various types of Alternative Medicine Practitioners one can consult to achieve wellness. However, many people do not live near an Alternative Healthcare Doctor even though they would like to consult with one. Natural MD Search wants to enhance its healthcare portal and build out functionality that will allow consumers to consult with participating Alternative Medicine doctors via a private video conference. Additionally, we'd like to add the ability for consumers to submit quick healthcare questions to providers on-line to be answered.


The money raised will be applied to website portal enhancements, continued maintenance of the website and enhancement and promotion of the knowledge base to consumers with the goal of making alternative healthcare more accessible and affordable to all people.

story: On the 22nd of June, our dear friend Chris Wheatley had a tragic motorbike accident that left him fighting for his life in Perth Royal Hospital. The extent of his injuries has not yet been released to the public, but it is going to be a long road to recovery. Gruelling operations and rehabilitation. Our aim is to give Chris an amazing future. If you are passionate about this campaign and would like to help, your donations would be greatly appreciated!

story:
Introduction

StarUML is one of the most popular UML modeling tool in the world. It has been downloaded over than 3,000,000 and used about 120 countries. However, the project was stopped because the main sponsor of the project was closed at long time ago.  Many users have been expecting that the project is being continued, developed and maintained. So, the original developers had decided to develop new version of StarUML and quit their jobs to focus on the development.

  • StarUML Official Site: http://staruml.io
  • Blog: http://blog.staruml.io
  • Google Groups: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/staruml
  • E-mail: support@staruml.io

Extensions

The key feature of StarUML 2 is high extensibility. You can easily find and install extensions from Extension Registry. Moreover, anyone can write extensions using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript and Node.js. Open APIs allows to add Menus, UI, Dialogs, even new modeling languages (e.g., ERD, BPMN, SysML, etc.).

Extension Manager
Currently, we provide Java extension which allows to generate Java source codes from UML models and to reverse from Java source codes to UML models. This extension is opened at Github: https://github.com/staruml/Java

Why We Need Fund?

We are a small team, but many users are expecting many extensions and features. To accelerate the development, we need more funds to hire developers who will implement features and extensions.

Where The Fund Will Be Used?

We will use the fund to hire developers in order to implement additional features and extensions and fix bugs. Candidate features and extensions of higher priority are follow:

  • C++ Code Generator and Reverse Engineer
  • C# Code Generator and Reverse Engineer
  • XMI Import/Export
  • Model Validator
  • API Documentation and User Guide
  • Additional Languages Support (Python, JavaScript, PHP, ...)
  • Additional Modeling Notations (FlowChart, ERD, SysML, ...)
  • And, more...
All extensions will be developed on Github as open source projects under MIT License. Much funds, many extensions!

story:
CPAP Horizon Project is a Professional Alliance of CPAP Therapy Providers, Sleep Physicians, and Sleep Professionals

Our Primary Goal Is To Improve The Overall Effectiveness And Sustainability Of CPAP Therapy In The United States

CPAP Horizon Project started with one simple question...

What if, with a few improvements, and the right resources, Clinicians and Therapy Providers could easily work together to deliver the highest standard of care, while at the same time, improving the health and sustainability of their own businesses and practices?

We all know there is a better way... and members of the CPAP Horizon Project alliance are creating it together.

We have a growing list of member benefits in the pipeline, but let's focus on what is available to you right now.

CPAP Horizon Project members enjoy unlimited use of...

  • The Horizon Protocols -- standardized, tested and optimized CPAP patient follow-up protocols (plus a free automated follow-up system)
  • ManageMyCPAP basic -- an automated, interactive patient follow-up, support, and tracking application
  • Horizon Exchange (HIE) -- Technology Integration and Data Sharing For All Stakeholders
  • CHP Dashboard -- CPAP therapy metrics, benchmarking and analytics ("Big Data" for CPAP therapy providers)
  • Annual Outcomes Assessment Survey -- clinical follow-up with past patients to measure outcomes and identify re-evaluation candidates

How's that for value?

We provide you with follow-up protocols, automated technology to 'run' those protocols, marketing support to attract more patients, and better ways of managing data and measuring outcomes... And we're just getting started!

Let me explain each of these member benefits separately, and I think you will agree that, through the CPAP Horizon Project alliance, we are solving the biggest issues facing CPAP therapy.

The Horizon Protocols -- Standardized, Optimized CPAP Patient Follow-Up

Consistent and timely short-term and long-term patient follow-up is critical. It is one of the most effective things you can do as a CPAP therapy provider to improve results.

For new patients, following up at several points during the first 30 days of therapy allows you to identify problems early and intervene to solve them.

For long-term patients, checking in several times a year has a big impact on patient satisfaction and overall outcomes. And again, if problems are identified, there is a good chance that they can be resolved, and the patient's therapy can get back on track.

There are, we can all agree, basic best practices that should be implemented for each patient. But, knowing (and proving) exactly what patient follow-up protocol is best requires an evidence-based, scientific approach.

Here's how CPAP Horizon Project helps our members manage their patients under the most effective follow-up protocol possible...

ManageMyCPAP -- An Automated, Interactive Patient Follow-Up And Support Application

We knew, when we started this project, that if we were going to have a measurable impact on the effectiveness of CPAP therapy in the United States, we needed a better, more cost effective way for CPAP Providers to follow-up with patients.

First, we planned to partner with an existing technology or service provider, but we quickly realized that if we wanted to have an effective solution, we were going to have to build it ourselves. Every existing solution was either too device/manufacturer-centric, mired down in old-school telephone technology, in poor financial condition, or missing critical patient-centric features.

Realizing that there was a gap between what was needed by our members and what was available in the market, we expanded the role of CPAP Horizon project to include acting as a technology incubator.

Through the CHP technology incubator, we provide the funding, guidance, support and resources to help technology projects get off the ground.

Our first project is ManageMyCPAP: A Patient Follow-up and Support Application for CPAP Therapy Providers and Clinicians

ManageMyCPAP is a a web and mobile application that makes it possible to stay consistently in touch with a large pool of active patients without having to add more staff.

ManageMyCPAP makes it easy to follow-up with patients through automated, interactive therapy checkups. After getting an email, text, or voice notification, patients simply log in and answer a few questions. If there are any issues that the CPAP Provider's staff should know about, they are alerted immediately.

ManageMyCPAP also makes it easy for patients to get the support they need by submitting their help requests in a private secure environment that maximizes staff efficiencies.

The basic level of ManageMyCPAP, which includes full support for the Horizon Protocols, is available to CPAP Horizon Project members at no additional charge.

You can learn more about ManageMyCPAP here

Horizon Exchange (HIE) -- Technology Integration and Data Sharing For All Stakeholders

One of the biggest challenges standing in the way of improving the effectiveness of CPAP therapy is the ability to share data across all stakeholders in the CPAP continuum of care.

Starting in September of 2013, CPAP Horizon Project will begin providing a Health Information Exchange (HIE) service to it's members that provides a way for various technologies to talk to each other and helps eliminate redundant data entry.

CHP Dashboard -- CPAP Therapy Metrics, Benchmarking And Analytics ("Big Data" For CPAP Therapy Providers)

One of the most critical elements of any business or therapeutic endeavor, is the ability to actually track and measure results. Unfortunately, CPAP therapy providers and clinicians often find themselves flying blind - without a good set of performance metrics.

We've got this 'new' concept in healthcare called 'big data' and there are a lot of discussions about the way it will transform markets. It's true, of course... in our market as well as all other healthcare markets, success is becoming more and more dependent on the ability to use data to improve efficiencies and outcomes.

In CPAP therapy, the challenge is mostly about defining an effective set of metrics that are accessible and available to every CPAP Provider and clinician.

Our members need measurements that show the health of their businesses and the effectiveness of the therapy they provide. Not just measurements developed by insurance companies, but rather, true performance metrics that our members can track over time.

Coming, in August of 2013, CPAP Horizon Project will begin providing our members with a simple, yet powerful, performance metrics dashboard. We'll give them an easy way to track key metrics and benchmark their results against member averages.

Our members gain powerful insights through standardized performance metrics, such as...

  • patient satisfaction
  • adherence rate
  • therapy status (inactive, new, active, off therapy)
  • daytime sleepiness
  • snoring
  • orders per year per patient
  • counts by machine and mask

Join CPAP Horizon Project as a Founding Member: Increase Adherence, Increase Efficiencies, Atttract More Patients, Increase Patient Satisfaction -- Guaranteed

By joining our alliance through this Indiegogo campaign, you will recieve, in member benefits, up to 20x the value of your contribution.

We are funding phase one of three roll-out phases right now. Phase one has the power, on it's own, to make an immediate and positive impact for CPAP Therapy Providers, Clinicians and most importantly, Patients.

And, we're just getting warmed up...

Wait 'til you see what we have in store for phases two and three.

But we need you, as a founding member, to make phase one a reality.

This project, without people, is nothing, that is why we we want to make it really easy for you to join our alliance today.

Click the 'Contribute Now' button and take advantage of our great founding member perks.

Let Us Prove How Effective The CPAP Horizon Project Alliance Can Be

Questions or Comments?

Please feel free to contact us at http://cpaphorizonproject.org/contact/ for any information on CPAP Horizon Project. We're happy to answer any questions you may have.

Thank you!

Click the 'Contribute Now' button and take advantage of our great founding member perks.

Ben is doing everything he can, to live his dream as a UFC fighter.

story:
Short Summary

Hello!  Thank you so much for visiting this fundraising page to raise money for  birth kit supplies for Bumi Sehat.   I have recently completed my three year midwifery training program at the National Midwifery Institute.  As a midwifery student I greatly admire the midwives at Yayasan Bumi Sehat.  I am traveling to Bali to play Balinese gamelan music with Gamelan Sekar Jaya.  60 musicians and I will be traveling all over the island to play at festivals and temple ceremonies.   I feel very passionately about raising money to help donate and bring supplies to the clinic, while I am in Bali playing gamelan music.  

Yayasan Bumi Sehat was founded in 1995 as an Indonesian not-for-profit organization. "Yayasan" means not-for-profit, "Bumi" means Earth-Mother, and "Sehat" translates as Healthy. Thus they are the Healthy Mother Earth Foundation.

In 2011, they expanded and added Bumi Sehat Foundation International, a 501(c)(3) registered in the United States.  They operate two Community Health Education and Childbirth Centers – one in Bali and another in post-tsunami Aceh, Indonesia. At the Bumi Sehat clinics you will find a blend of allopathic and holistic medicine, which effectively reduces suffering. Research has proven that our children’s first classroom is the womb. Each baby’s capacity to love and trust is built at birth and in the first two hours of life. By protecting pregnancy, birth, postpartum and breastfeeding, the midwives at Bumi Sehat are advocating for optimal humanity, health, intelligence and consciousness. Last year alone, the recorded human services provided by Bumi Sehat totaled more than 50,000.

I have been in communication with the volunteer director at Bumi Sehat and they have given me a list of supplies the clinic is in need of.  Once the money is raised I will purchase the birth kit supplies through McKesson SupplyManager.

What We Need & What You Get

Birth Kit Supplies:

 -sterile gloves, non-sterile gloves, sterile fields, gauze, alcohol swabs, lubricating jelly, suture material, lidocaine, homeopathic remedies, postpartum sitz bath herbs, chux pads, medications for hemorrhage (pitocin, methergine, misoprostol), and herbs.  

I will personally carry and hand deliver all of the supplies to the clinic.

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you again for checking out this campaign.  If you are not able to contribute financially, please feel free to spread the word to friends, family and your social media community.  Bring awareness to this campaign will be greatly appreciated.   Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Tyler was in a car accident back in July. He is still fighting his way through recovery and rehabilitation, as he is still currently in a comatose style state. He is not fully "awake" yet and we are still waiting on the day when that will come. My name is Nathan  and Tyler is one of my friends from high school and I decided to start this fundraiser to help raise some money to help out his family through this difficult time.

Impact

I am not looking for large amounts of donations as any will of any amount will help and the fact that you help at all leaves me speechless. I am merely looking to get some money to the family to help with at least a small fraction of the medical bills. 

What I feel your donations will do more is to show the family that they are not alone and that there are people all over the world that not only support them but also care about their son. They are the nicest people and it is hard to think something like this could happen to them and their son.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not able to donate one dollar, One way you can help is by going to the Team Tyler Facebook page his parents made and leaving a comment showing your support. That is the most that I can ask from anyone, just by showing support and letting them know that Tyler and his family is in yall's hearts, minds and prayers. Here is the link to Team Tylers page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Team-Tyler/1394285514195589
