story:
UPDATE 21st NOV: 

We will dispatch all the Starter Pack device packs ordered before Dec 15th for Christmas. So this will be a perfect gift :-)

API feature and integrations will be added in February 2015 if this project is successful.

Cheers, Checkmylevel team


 


Check out video testimonial from Darby Thomas.

WHAT IS CHECKMYLEVEL?

It all started from horses. Our founder was studying race horses and noticed an interesting phenomena. Low-voltage electric current could be used to assess the recovery status of the horse. After a long period of research something completely new was born: The Checkmylevel Training Readiness and Recovery Monitor. It uses low-voltage current to stimulate your muscles and nerves, your peripheral nervous system to be exact.

And the result? The most accurate device to assess your recovery. And why is recovery important? As they say: train and get tired, rest and improve. 

Checkmylevel includes a novel assessment device, smartphone app and reusable electrodes all included in the starter pack. Verify the tested smartphone models from our website.


WHY MONITOR YOUR TRAINING READINESS AND RECOVERY LEVEL?

Many people like to train hard but do not assess their recovery. They should. And now they can! Checkmylevel is the fastest and most accurate way to boost your performance. And now it is available for you.


Assessing these factors has formerly been possible in lab environment only and therefore out of reach for a recreational athlete, i.e. for someone who trains with a goal-oriented mindset. But not anymore: with Checkmylevel you can do it anytime, anywhere.

WHY CHECKMYLEVEL?

We have developed Checkmylevel together with athletes and sports scientists in the cold but tech-savvy Finland. It has been used by professional athletes and teams around the world. And now we are extremely proud to bring our state of the art solution for Recovery and Training Readiness assessment to you. If you want to push that extra mile or avoid injuries, you should monitor your recovery.

With this campaign we will be able to introduce the next generation of Checkmylevel to the Weekend Warriors. So whether you are training for marathon, playing football or training hard in the gym, this is the ultimate solution for you. We will bring the integrated solution to the markets in Q1/2015, but as a supporter you will get it sooner (JAN-FEB) among the first ones - and with a serious discount! 

We have developed solutions for single users as well as for teams. Go and check out our perks.

We have designed Checkmylevel to be an off-exercise assessment fast and easy to use. You assess yourself once a day - preferably in the morning or at least before the 1st training session of the day - and the assessment takes only 30 seconds. The results are visible in your smartphone immediately. That´s why it is the fastest and easiest way to assess your Training Readiness and Recovery level. 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT!

We are aiming for 80 K$ for the development of our integration interface. This will enable us to combine the unique Checkmylevel recovery data to 3rd party systems. The first one will be the best sleep monitoring system in the market, Beddit (www.beddit.com). Why? Because sleep is the most important component in your  recovery. 

Naturally we will introduce plenty of integrations later, e.g. to the most popular online training diaries. But one step at a time.

We have created interesting perks. You can get our starter pack in different sizes, and we also have a team package available. In fact, you can even become a distributor for Checkmylevel! You can also do your workout in our cool Checkmylevel training gear. 

And last but not least: we offer the Checkmylevel-Beddit -bundle for ultimate recovery monitoring.



THE IMPACT AND RISKS

It is time to change the way we monitor our body. In many sports, heart-rate -based assessments (like HRV) just do not work. With Checkmylevel, we bring an easy and convenient way to assess your recovery available for everyday use. No more exhaustion, no more injuries. Always on shape. 

With this campaign, we can launch the updated Checkmylevel -solution to global consumer markets. We already have solutions for both iOS (7.0 ->) and Android (4.x ->) and there should be no major technology risks. 



HOW YOU CAN HELP?

We need your support! If you find our promise compelling please share our campaign in your network: blogs, social media or even by email. Also the Indiegogo share tools are very useful. 

People do not know about us - you can be of great assistance and spread our story. For more information visit www.checkmylevel.com.

FAQ

What is the science behind Checkmylevel?

The origins of Checkmylevel is on electric treatment to race horses. It was discovered that the body of a race horse reacted differently to electric current depending on the fatigue level. The phenomena was studied extensively and the Checkmylevel Method was developed for professional athletes and medical use.

It is based on the well known phenomena of peripheral muscle reflex caused by electric stimulation. We have utilized this knowledge to develop a unique method to track and measure specific neural waves. The method was first commercialized for physiotherapy and later as FAM Sports Training Optimizer device in 2010. In 2013 the Checkmylevel device and service was released for professional sports markets.


How is Checkmylevel different than other methods (e.g. HRV or EMG)?

Checkmylevel is especially aimed for sport requiring explosive power, speed, skill and coordination. Heart rate monitoring such as HRV and other cardio-vascular methods do not provide accurate results on the overall body load for such athletes. There is also significant delay when using HRV for the purpose of tracking muscle performance, e.g. explosiveness. EMG is efficient when measuring the load on a single muscle but does not provide assessment on total load on the neuro-muscular system as basis for training optimization.

Checkmylevel provides a rapid and more accurate assessment of your readiness. The monitoring system is sensitive to all kinds of physiological changes in your body, such as infections and trauma.


Are there any age restrictions?

Checkmylevel should only be used by people aged 15 years and older


How do I do the assessment and how to interpret the results?

Checkmylevel is a comprehensive solution providing you with 1) the analysis on your recovery level and 2) an instant training recommendation for today. We advise you to complete the assessment in the morning after you wake up or at least before the first training session of the day. You do not have to lie down for the assessment, you can e.g. have a morning cup of coffee while assessing. It should only take about 30 seconds.

The Training Readiness Index (TRI) is the instant overview of the current recovery status of your body. The Training Recommendation is based on long term changes in your body. Therefore - in some cases - the TRI might change significantly (e.g. after maximum intensity training session) but the Recommendation will stay the same. Any sudden changes in the Training Recommendation should be analyzed carefully.

Are there any monthly fees for the service?

There are no monthly fees for the service. However, at some point you need to purchase more re-usable electrodes.

story:
YAY FUNDED!

Thanks so much to everyone that supported our campaign, you guys are awesome!
If you missed out on our campaign don't worry you can now order from our website here:  
 

BUY NOW - Cricket Protein Powder

 

 

Seen on:

Taste Tests:

 

Cricket Protein Powder

Gain Protein. Acquire Health. Save Earth.

 

 

Creating normal animal based protein uses up huge amounts of the Earth's resources. Leaving a large environmental footprint.

Crik Nutrition's Cricket Protein Powder has a comparatively miniscule footprint and is denser with nutrients. Two ...crickets, one stone.

 

 

 

CLICK HERE to learn more on our site

 

 

 

 

 

 

Crik Nutrition's Cricket Protein Powder is one of the best protein powders for the Earth.

But before we get into that, here's why its the best protein powder for you.

Need help reaching your protein goal for the day?

Cricket Protein Powder won't just help you reach your protein macro. 

It'll help with your micronutrients too.

By combining...

 

  • Organic Crickets (Main Ingredient)
  • Pea
  • Organic Hemp 
  • Organic Brown Rice
  • Organic Stevia
  • Flaxseed (We all need that fiber)
  • Coconut Oil

 

And a few other interesting nutrients in crickets:

  • Amino Acids
  • Omega-3 and 6 Fatty acids
  • 3x more Iron vs Beef
  • 5x more Magnesium vs Beef
  • As much Calcium as Milk
  • A ton of B-Vitamins
  • Zinc

 

The nutritional information provided above should be used as a guideline/estimate only.The nutritional data has been derived through calculations based on typical nutritional information of raw materials. Complete and accurate nutritional information can only be obtained through chemical analysis of the finished product. 

 

 

CLICK HERE for more detailed nutritional breakdowns

 

 

Plus, its taste is on point - Absolutely delicious and hits the spot.
 

Oh, and did I mention there's no sugar added?

You have no idea how much your body will love you after having a shake.

R.I.P. Jiminy Cricket. You were a nutritious man.

Mixes smoothly with 1 scoop and 250 ml of Water

 

Why Crickets?

In many of the developing countries in the world, eating insects, rice and cassava (tapioca) is part of a normal diet. Many of us chose to adopt a lot of their food into our diets and yet opted out the insects due to the gross factor. 

What we didn't realize is that we just opted out of one of the most nutritionally dense and eco-friendly food.

Nutrient Packed

 

Eco-Friendly & Sustainable

      Holy cow!

      North America is losing out on the benefits Crickets bring due to the gross factor.

      Crik Nutrition eliminates that gross factor by creating a delicious, vanilla flavoured protein powder that has absolutely zero similarity to crickets - look, taste or texture.

      *ALLERGEN WARNING - If you have a seafood / shellfish allergy you may be allergic to crickets*

       

       

      CLICK HERE to learn more on our site

      The Story 

       

      I was working a 6-figure job while obtaining a healthy lifestyle, what most people think is the ideal lifestyle to live.

      But I wasn't content.

      I wanted to create something awesome.

      I wanted to be an entrepreneur.

      So I quit my job and sold everything I owned so that I could start a new business.

      After moving to Europe to learn about business from successful friends, I noticed something peculiar - People were eating cricket protein bars.

      Coming from Manitoba, Canada, I found this... Interesting.

      I looked up on why choose crickets over normal protein bars and I was BLOWN AWAY by the health benefits and sustainability of crickets over cattle (what most protein bars/powders are made of). 

      It really seemed too good to be true.

      I wanted to give crickets a go, but unfortunately, I don't really eat protein bars.

      I'm more of a protein powder kinda guy.

      So I searched for cricket protein powder and found absolutely none.

      Woah. What?

      Why not? It has astounding health benefits and is more eco-friendly compared to normal protein powders. Why hasn't anyone created it before? I have no idea.

      I have to create this.

      The world needs this.

      Everyone needs to try this.

      I learned how to create protein powder from scratch, from sourcing manufacturers, creating crude formulas and finding cricket farms (I eventually found one)

      After months and months of development, I finally came up with Crik Nutrition's very first product - Vanilla Flavoured Cricket Protein Powder.

      Insects are becoming big and in your generation, they'll be part of everyone's diet.

      I'm stoked for this to happen and I hope you guys are too. You & I are going to be the first creators of cricket protein powder, which quite possibly could become the main type of protein powder in the future!

      Even if crickets aren't your thing, you could give it a try just to show off to your friends how badass you are and at the same time, give back to Earth.

      Nobody can make this happen alone. 

      That's why Crik needs you guys! Together, we can prove that we can make delicious, nourishing protein powder without harming Earth.

      If you don't have the means to back us, no worries! Just support us and let others know. A little goes a long way.

      - Alex Drysdale, Founder of Crik Nutrition

      P.S. - I'm also hoping that with your help in making Crik a successful company it will allow it to buy the family farm (above) that my Grandparent built in the 30's and maybe even become a cricket farm of it's own. I'd love to keep this from being bought and split up by developers.

       

       

       

       

       

      Where We Are At

      The formula is right where it needs to be.

      The fulfillment company and warehouse is set.

      The manufacturer and suppliers are lined up and waiting.

      Everyone is set and ready to go as soon as I give the word.

      And once Crik is funded, I'll say the word. (Bird is the word)

      Why September for Delivery?

      We are aiming for a worst case scenario the beginning of September for when you will see your rewards. This takes into account all the lead time required for the crickets, packaging, and actual final manufacturing of the protein and also adds in some wiggle room for those unpredictables. 

      The last thing we want, is for you guys to have problems with your product.

      **Shipping costs outside of USA & Canada are the responsibility of the buyer**

       

      What We Need 

       

      Your support! 

      All we need now is enough support from you guys to raise enough funds for packaging, micro testing, raw ingredients and manufacturing deposit. After that, we will have produced the World's First Cricket Protein Powder!

       

      Risks And Challenges

      We have done our very best to have every detail accounted for and lined up so we can basically say "GO" to our suppliers and get the ball rolling as soon as we are funded.

      Delivery dates are given with a little time built in for some minor delays but of course there could always be some unforeseen circumstance or disaster that could hold things back longer.

      Potential changes and delays might be:

      1. MANUFACTURING - We've given some buffer time to allow for any small delays.

      2. FORMULA CHANGES - We don't want to limit ourselves. You never know what awesome ideas you guys might suggest. We do however promise we won't do anything silly like add sugar or soy into the mix. If there are any changes made, they will be awesome.

      3. SHIPPING - Storms and Customs delays happen. We are doing everything on our end to make sure this goes as smooth as possible.

      **Shipping costs outside of USA & Canada are the responsibility of the buyer**

      4. REGULATORY DELAYS - All of our ingredients are approved on their own but when it comes to mixing them together, some regulatory agencies want to double check. We don't foresee any problems here and have everything underway for this to be completed before the ship date.

      We want to get you your protein fast but also want to make sure all the proper steps along the way. This is not a fly-by-night business, we plan on being around for a long time with many new products, so we just want to make sure things get done 100% right the first time.

      We'll always keep in touch with how things are going and if there are any hiccups. 100% transparency is our policy.

       

       

      www.CrikNutrition.com

       

      The Team

         

      Alex Drysdale - Founder

       

      Chris Thompson - is our narrator / director / audio guy for our campaign video. We owe him a huge thanks for all the time, energy, and creativity he put into getting such a great video made up in an extremely short period of time.

      He can be contacted by email: super_chris@hotmail.com

       

      Thanks for checking us out and reading right through to the nitty gritty end. Just as a remind any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal.

      Help us make the Crik Nutrition's Protein Powder a reality by clicking the big pink ‘CONTRIBUTE NOW’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

      We raise a tall cool glass of crickety goodness in your honor, and say THANK YOU for your help!

Organic Brown Rice
Organic Stevia
Flaxseed (We all need that fiber)
Coconut Oil


 And a few other interesting nutrients in crickets:
 
Amino Acids
Omega-3 and 6 Fatty acids
3x more Iron vs Beef
5x more Magnesium vs Beef
As much Calcium as Milk
A ton of B-Vitamins
Zinc

  
 The nutritional information provided above should be used as a guideline/estimate only.The nutritional data has been derived through calculations based on typical nutritional information of raw materials. Complete and accurate nutritional information can only be obtained through chemical analysis of the finished product. 
  
  
 CLICK HERE for more detailed nutritional breakdowns
  
  
Plus, its taste is on point - Absolutely delicious and hits the spot. 
 

Oh, and did I mention there's no sugar added? 
You have no idea how much your body will love you after having a shake.R.I.P. Jiminy Cricket. You were a nutritious man.

Mixes smoothly with 1 scoop and 250 ml of Water
 
Why Crickets?
In many of the developing countries in the world, eating insects, rice and cassava (tapioca) is part of a normal diet. Many of us chose to adopt a lot of their food into our diets and yet opted out the insects due to the gross factor. 

What we didn't realize is that we just opted out of one of the most nutritionally dense and eco-friendly food.
Nutrient Packed
 

Eco-Friendly & Sustainable


Holy cow!
North America is losing out on the benefits Crickets bring due to the gross factor.
Crik Nutrition eliminates that gross factor by creating a delicious, vanilla flavoured protein powder that has absolutely zero similarity to crickets - look, taste or texture.

*ALLERGEN WARNING - If you have a seafood / shellfish allergy you may be allergic to crickets*

 
 
CLICK HERE to learn more on our site
The Story 
 
I was working a 6-figure job while obtaining a healthy lifestyle, what most people think is the ideal lifestyle to live.
But I wasn't content.
I wanted to create something awesome.
I wanted to be an entrepreneur.
So I quit my job and sold everything I owned so that I could start a new business.
After moving to Europe to learn about business from successful friends, I noticed something peculiar - People were eating cricket protein bars.
Coming from Manitoba, Canada, I found this... Interesting.
I looked up on why choose crickets over normal protein bars and I was BLOWN AWAY by the health benefits and sustainability of crickets over cattle (what most protein bars/powders are made of). 
It really seemed too good to be true.
I wanted to give crickets a go, but unfortunately, I don't really eat protein bars.
I'm more of a protein powder kinda guy.
So I searched for cricket protein powder and found absolutely none.
Woah. What?
Why not? It has astounding health benefits and is more eco-friendly compared to normal protein powders. Why hasn't anyone created it before? I have no idea.
I have to create this.
The world needs this.
Everyone needs to try this.
I learned how to create protein powder from scratch, from sourcing manufacturers, creating crude formulas and finding cricket farms (I eventually found one)
After months and months of development, I finally came up with Crik Nutrition's very first product - Vanilla Flavoured Cricket Protein Powder.
Insects are becoming big and in your generation, they'll be part of everyone's diet.
I'm stoked for this to happen and I hope you guys are too. You & I are going to be the first creators of cricket protein powder, which quite possibly could become the main type of protein powder in the future!
Even if crickets aren't your thing, you could give it a try just to show off to your friends how badass you are and at the same time, give back to Earth.
Nobody can make this happen alone. 
That's why Crik needs you guys! Together, we can prove that we can make delicious, nourishing protein powder without harming Earth.
If you don't have the means to back us, no worries! Just support us and let others know. A little goes a long way.
- Alex Drysdale, Founder of Crik Nutrition

P.S. - I'm also hoping that with your help in making Crik a successful company it will allow it to buy the family farm (above) that my Grandparent built in the 30's and maybe even become a cricket farm of it's own. I'd love to keep this from being bought and split up by developers.
   


 
 
Where We Are At
The formula is right where it needs to be.
The fulfillment company and warehouse is set.
The manufacturer and suppliers are lined up and waiting.
Everyone is set and ready to go as soon as I give the word.
And once Crik is funded, I'll say the word. (Bird is the word)
Why September for Delivery?
We are aiming for a worst case scenario the beginning of September for when you will see your rewards. This takes into account all the lead time required for the crickets, packaging, and actual final manufacturing of the protein and also adds in some wiggle room for those unpredictables. 
The last thing we want, is for you guys to have problems with your product.
**Shipping costs outside of USA & Canada are the responsibility of the buyer**
 
What We Need 
 
Your support! 
All we need now is enough support from you guys to raise enough funds for packaging, micro testing, raw ingredients and manufacturing deposit. After that, we will have produced the World's First Cricket Protein Powder!
 
Risks And Challenges
We have done our very best to have every detail accounted for and lined up so we can basically say "GO" to our suppliers and get the ball rolling as soon as we are funded.Delivery dates are given with a little time built in for some minor delays but of course there could always be some unforeseen circumstance or disaster that could hold things back longer.Potential changes and delays might be: 1. MANUFACTURING - We've given some buffer time to allow for any small delays.2. FORMULA CHANGES - We don't want to limit ourselves. You never know what awesome ideas you guys might suggest. We do however promise we won't do anything silly like add sugar or soy into the mix. If there are any changes made, they will be awesome.3. SHIPPING - Storms and Customs delays happen. We are doing everything on our end to make sure this goes as smooth as possible.**Shipping costs outside of USA & Canada are the responsibility of the buyer**4. REGULATORY DELAYS - All of our ingredients are approved on their own but when it comes to mixing them together, some regulatory agencies want to double check. We don't foresee any problems here and have everything underway for this to be completed before the ship date.We want to get you your protein fast but also want to make sure all the proper steps along the way. This is not a fly-by-night business, we plan on being around for a long time with many new products, so we just want to make sure things get done 100% right the first time.We'll always keep in touch with how things are going and if there are any hiccups. 100% transparency is our policy.  www.CrikNutrition.com The Team   Alex Drysdale - Founder Chris Thompson - is our narrator / director / audio guy for our campaign video. We owe him a huge thanks for all the time, energy, and creativity he put into getting such a great video made up in an extremely short period of time.He can be contacted by email: super_chris@hotmail.com Thanks for checking us out and reading right through to the nitty gritty end. Just as a remind any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal.Help us make the Crik Nutrition's Protein Powder a reality by clicking the big pink ‘CONTRIBUTE NOW’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.We raise a tall cool glass of crickety goodness in your honor, and say THANK YOU for your help!

story: I simply wanted to reach out.  Breast Cancer is real.  It hurts families.  I wasn't happy with my initial attempt.  Nuff Said.  Check out the video for the full explanation...

story:
Short Summary

FreeSpeechMe is a Free Software plug-in for Firefox that allows you to effortlessly view Dot-Bit websites. Dot-Bit is a new type of website that, unlike Dot-Com or Dot-Net (etc), is NOT controlled by any government or corporation.

We already have working beta versions of the FreeSpeechMe Free Software plug-in for Windows and GNU/Linux. You can start using them today. We have them ready to install on our website at:  http://www.freespeechme.org


Dot-Bit is also resistant to DNS or HTTPS hijacking, which is common and easy with normal top-level domains. DNS or HTTPS hijacking is when someone redirects your traffic to an impostor website, which allows them to steal passwords or install malware.  DNS and HTTPS hijacking are not theoretical threats.  In July 2011, DigiNotar, a major corporation in charge of preventing hijacking, was compromised. Over 300,000 users fell victim to fraudulent websites which appeared to be HTTPS-secured. The attackers were able to impersonate the CIA, MI6, Facebook, Microsoft, Skype, Twitter, WordPress, Mozilla, and hundreds of other targets. DigiNotar didn't notice for over a month.  Dot-Bit would have eliminated this attack vector.

Dot-Bit domains propagate worldwide within minutes, so new Dot-Bit websites show up promptly for everyone, rather than in 24-72 hours like with other domains. Dot-Bit is secured using the same peer-to-peer technology which protects Bitcoin.

FreeSpeechMe rises above previous Dot-Bit software packages in that it does not need to trust any third parties, AND it's easy to install.

You can register a Dot-Bit domain today using the inexpensive digital currency, Namecoin (a spin-off of Bitcoin which provides the infrastructure for Dot-Bit). Dot-Bit domains currently cost just a few pennies to register, and you don't have to go through anyone else to do it. We've written easy to follow guides on doing all of this.

FreeSpeechMe also supports a new feature of Dot-Bit domains: the ability to point to anonymously hosted websites using Tor or I2P. Tor and I2P are networks that allow users to host websites without revealing their identities or locations.

Tor and I2P are a necessity for human rights activists and whistleblowers working in repressive countries, and both networks were critical in keeping citizens safe during the Arab Spring. FreeSpeechMe solves a major issue that has plagued Tor and I2P: giving them domain names that both are human-memorable (Tor normally has domains like duskgytldkxiuqc6.onion) and can only point to the correct website (I2P domains can normally point to different websites for different users). Note that Dot-Bit only keeps the location and IP address of the domain owner private (assuming the domain is registered using Tor); the identity of the domain owner may be linkable with that person's other usage of Namecoin (e.g. usernames at exchanges).

MEET THE VIRAL ELECTRON CHAOS LABORATORIES ONE-PERSON TEAM:

Jeremy Rand: FreeSpeechMe creator and programmer.

Jeremy runs Viral Electron Chaos Laboratories. He’s a Computer Science major at the University of Oklahoma. He works in research fields relating to robotics and game enhancement.

Jeremy co-wrote the Tor- and I2P-Service Support for the current Dot-Bit specification. It was accepted and implemented by the Namecoin development community.

FreeSpeechMe is the first software to implement this feature.

Jeremy is the author or co-author of five additional Dot-Bit specification proposals that have been accepted by the Namecoin development community and are awaiting implementation.

THIS PROJECT ISN'T JUST FOR US. It's for the world....Though we will personally be incredibly grateful to each and every person who can help. We are offering perks, but the real prize for everyone will be a more-free and more-secure Internet.

HERE'S THE DESIGN FOR OUR T-SHIRT PERK:

We are also releasing the source code to the world. This is Free Software.

What We Need & What You Get

Please donate if you can.

Even if you can't donate, please tell two friends. We have a press release here: 

http://www.freespeechme.org/press-release/

that you can post, and send to as many people as possible. And whether you donate or not, please download our FreeSpeechMe plug-in and start checking out the Dot-Bit web today.

And don't just check it out, start building these new roads. You can easily and inexpensively start your own censorship-resistant and secure Dot-Bit website TODAY with our clear and easy tutorials. They're all on our website: http://www.freespeechme.org


CAN YOU GET THIS DONE IF YOU DON'T REACH YOUR FULL GOAL?
We are unquestionably dedicated this project. We will work on this as hard as we can with whatever funds we raise. But to really hit it out of the park, $50,000 is what we feel we'd need.

If we pass our goal, we will work longer on this. The more money we raise, the better we can make the software, and the more we can spread it. Widespread adoption of this is paramount to its success.

BREAKDOWN OF WHERE THE FUNDS WILL GO (After Indiegogo takes their cut off the top):

30%: Compensation for programmer Jeremy Rand to allow him to work as much as possible on improving FreeSpeechMe for as long as possible. He will also be the project coordinator with other programmers.

35%: Rewards for other programmers who help perfect the FreeSpeechMe plug-in, write WordPress plug-ins to streamline more seamless integration, payment for better web design, graphics, video editing, etc.

25%: Marketing and advertising expenses. (This is a maximum value; we expect that the actual expenses will be lower. If not all spent, it will be distributed according to the ratio of the above items to improve FreeSpeechMe.)

5%: Perks and postage for perks.

5%: Misc / prudent reserve for unexpected expenses / legal expenses / extra cloud hosting if we get suddenly slammed with traffic, etc. Will likely all be spent but if any ends up unspent, it will return to Jeremy to fund additional full-time work on FreeSpeechMe.


Bitcoin:
1JfNztz7GfcxPFXQTnxjco6HA53fg491FV


Namecoin:
N4hnrzpQAiwwYXjvMVfqeoenUsvjZNRifV

We love all donations, but we especially love donations in Namecoin. Namecoin is the concrete used to build the roads of this new Internet superhighway system.

This isn't just "a plug-in." FreeSpeechMe, Dot-Bit and Namecoin are a complete new Internet ecosystem. We are building the roads to a secure and censor-resistant Web 4.0.

TO-DO LIST FOR CODING AND BOUNTIES

As a Namecoin-based project, FreeSpeechMe is part of a significant ecosystem of software which can benefit from improvements.  Since FreeSpeechMe directly uses much of this software, and we like to give back, we plan to use some of the funds we raise to improve the underlying Namecoin software, in addition to the FreeSpeechMe code itself.  Because what's good for Namecoin is good for FreeSpeechMe, and what's good for FreeSpeechMe is good for Namecoin.

We'll favor hiring people who actually already did some of the work on Namecoin and Namecoin-related software. First because they know the code better than anyone, but also because they deserve to be first in line for paid bounties on Namecoin-related systems.

Below are some examples of the improvements to both FreeSpeechMe and other Namecoin-universe software that we want to have a hand in implementing.  Some of these could be put into operation directly by us, others we would like to fund via posting bounties.  Note that Namecoin-related improvements are typically discussed in the development community to ensure high-quality design, so it is possible that some of the improvements listed below will change based on community feedback.

Just getting to our current FreeSpeechMe beta has been an immense undertaking. But we'd like to go much further, to do the "work under the hood" that the average user never sees, but that results in a system that could solve many of the problems currently experienced in the entire Internet. We need to do a lot of heavy lifting to not just build an impermeable shell around this new system, but to harden the system itself into that worldwide walled fortress for freedom.

But we also take this down to complex frame-level surgical engineering that will make FreeSpeechMe effortless to use and incredibly valuable to everyone worldwide who uses the Internet.

Think about what a massively complex system Google is. Now think about what the average user sees: just a simple search box on a mostly blank page. We're not postulating that FreeSpeechMe will grow to be as complex as Google, but the analogy is apt.

Below is our ambitious list. We can implement many of these if we reach our funding goal. If we don't reach our goal, we'll get as much done as possible.

FreeSpeechMe-SPECIFIC IMPROVEMENTS WE PLAN TO DO:

Hide nmcontrol/namecoind windows on Windows

GNU/Linux users don't see the terminal windows for backend software; Windows users shouldn't be bothered by them either.

Don't try to visit .bit websites when blockchain isn't downloaded

  Right now, visiting a .bit website with an incomplete blockchain will use an older version of that name's data.  Usually this results in a failure to load the page with no good explanation of what's wrong, but in certain rare cases it could also hypothetically result in security issues such as hijacking.  A better version of FreeSpeechMe should refuse to use incomplete blockchains.

Facilitate non-Firefox usage

  FreeSpeechMe uses a networking method, HTTP, which is specific to website traffic.  Replacing it with a different method, SOCKS, would make it much more flexible, so you could use Dot-Bit for non-website Internet applications such as SSH.  It should also be possible to route other web browsers such as Chromium through FreeSpeechMe.  FreeSpeechMe should support being installed as a standalone application for users who don't use Firefox (although obviously Firefox will remain the main method of installation).

Improvements for anonymous browsing

  Right now FreeSpeechMe supports routing its traffic through anonymization proxies such as Tor and I2P (if they are installed), but it is not compatible with TorBrowser, so while attackers generally can't see your location or IP address, they can deduce that different activities you do online may have come from the same person. FreeSpeechMe should be improved to function in TorBrowser, which would prevent linkage of different online activities.

Improvements for anonymous hosting

  FreeSpeechMe supports Tor and I2P hidden services (if the user has Tor or I2P installed), but does not support Freenet, OnionCat, GarliCat, or other anonymous hosting networks.  This should be improved.

Support for next-gen TLS specification

  FreeSpeechMe is using a method of specifying certificates to prevent hijacking which is deprecated in the Dot-Bit specification. While this method remains very secure, the newer specification has more features, and FreeSpeechMe should implement it.

HTTPS enforcement

  Websites which claim to support HTTPS in their domain record should automatically be loaded in HTTPS, even if the user accidentally forgets the "s", to prevent hijacking in such cases. (Note for geeks: this is like the HSTS specification, but works even for sites you haven't visited before.)

Intelligent Redirecting

  Websites that want to support Dot-Bit should be able to do so without changing their server configuration, and instead have FreeSpeechMe make the server think the preexisting domain is being requested.  The user would still see the Dot-Bit URL in Firefox, and unlike iframe-based methods, the URL displayed in Firefox would change accordingly as the user clicks links..

Fix HTTP protocol bugs

  Unencrypted HTTP Dot-Bit websites occasionally have odd behavior in FreeSpeechMe (sometimes manifesting as links not working properly); this is most frequently seen in WordPress websites.  While we strongly encourage the use of HTTPS (which isn't subject to these bugs), we still want to fix the bugs with HTTP websites.

Round-Robin Load Balancing

  Some large websites use multiple server IP addresses for a single domain.  FreeSpeechMe should be able to randomly choose one.

OTHER NAMECOIN SOFTWARE IMPROVEMENTS

  Some of this is possibly out of the scope of this one Indiegogo campaign, depending on funds raised. But these are things we're very interested in helping implement:

Rebase on the latest Bitcoin code

  Namecoin is based on an outdated version of Bitcoin (0.3.x).  We should rebase on a current release.  We inquired with a well-qualified and well-respected contractor (who developed Namecoin-Qt) about how much this rebase would cost; the estimate was around $17,000-$35,000 US.  Spending that much on one project would be out of the realm of this first campaign.  However, it may be possible to reduce this cost significantly by rebasing on a codebase other than Bitcoin, such as libcoin.

Improve scalability

  Namecoin currently requires having the entire blockchain for good security.  While the 1.6GB blockchain isn't a large concern right now, future scalability requires that clients be able to securely resolve names without possessing the blockchain.  There is a proposal for this called SPV+UTXO.

Automatic renewal of names

  Losing your names because you forgot to renew them is a problem. 

Names should be able to be renewed automatically. Preferably without decrypting the wallet each time the name is renewed, and maybe without even needing your client to be open when it renews.  Any solution must be trust-free.

Cold storage of Namecoin name keys

  To update a Namecoin name, the keys must be decrypted on a computer with Internet access; this could be a security risk if malware is installed on that computer.  To fix this, cold storage should be used, as is possible with Bitcoin. 

  This is in two parts: (1) port the Armory client to Namecoin (this allows transactions to be signed offline), and (2) allow a cold-storage name to be used as a revocation key for a hot-wallet name (this is called the "import" field).

Optimize Speed

  Dot-Bit is already much faster than other top-level domains for both name lookup and name propagation.  However, it can be made even faster. 

We estimate that pre-cached name lookup time can be decreased by 2- to 5-fold in some cases, uncached name lookup time can be decreased significantly, name update propagation can be reduced from 40 minutes to under 1 minute, and blockchain sync time can be reduced significantly.

Android support

  Namecoin software currently does not support Android; this situation should be improved.

Better blockchain anonymity

  Like Bitcoin, Namecoin can keep the location and IP address of name owners anonymous (if used with Tor), but the various activities of name owners can be linked by an attacker.  This should be improved, e.g. by implementing Zerocoin.

Better blockchain privacy

  Some name owners may wish their records to not be publicly accessible; encryption would improve this situation.

Decentralized website single sign-on

  Namecoin can be used to log into websites in a secure way without needing a password (protecting people from database leaks or cracked passwords without trusting a third party such as "all your data are belong to us" systems like Facebook); this is implemented as the NameID library by domob.  Unfortunately, this library is not easy for non-programmers to integrate with existing websites. Plugins should be created for major website backends such as Drupal, phpBB, WordPress, and SMF, to allow trust-free NameID sign-on to be as easy as checking a box.

Automated builds

  Namecoin software should support automated builds and testing so that our developers and testers can work more efficiently.  The builds should also be deterministic (as Bitcoin and Tor are doing) to improve security.

Offline signing of static websites

  Verifying signatures of static websites against the blockchain would prevent hijacking even if a web server is completely compromised.

SSH client integration

  Log into your servers remotely without trusting your network or manually verifying fingerprints, using the same anti-hijacking features that FreeSpeechMe first implemented.

PERKS

They are all pretty nifty and fun. But we've chosen each perk carefully; they all promote the FreeSpeechMe plug-in. Because the primary goals of this campaign are:

  • Promoting FreeSpeechMe
  • Improving the software and the methodologies for adopting and utilizing it
  • Spreading adoption Dot-Bit

Closing Arguments

It's often remarked that the Internet runs the world.  But if governments, corporations, and criminals can censor and hijack websites at will, the end result won't be good for the Internet, or the world.  We have a solid track record working with the technologies behind Dot-Bit.  We created the first ever implementation of the Dot-Bit feature which prevents HTTPS hijacking, as well as the first ever trust-free Dot-Bit Firefox plug-in.  We are an active participant in the Dot-Bit and Namecoin development process.

FreeSpeechMe is a game-changing world-advancing leap for freedom. Please help us raise 50,000 dollars to further perfect the FreeSpeechMe Free Software plug-in, spread its adoption and adoption of Dot-Bit, and help save the Internet from the website censors and hijackers of the world.

impermeable shell around this new system, but to harden the system itself into

But we also take this down to complex frame-level surgical
engineering that will make FreeSpeechMe effortless to use and incredibly
valuable to everyone worldwide who uses the Internet.
Think about what a massively complex system Google is. Now
think about what the average user sees: just a simple search box on a mostly
blank page. We're not postulating that FreeSpeechMe will grow to be as complex
as Google, but the analogy is apt. 
Below is our ambitious list. We can implement many of these
if we reach our funding goal. If we don't reach our goal, we'll get as much
done as possible. 

FreeSpeechMe-SPECIFIC IMPROVEMENTS WE PLAN TO DO:
Hide nmcontrol/namecoind windows on WindowsGNU/Linux users don't see the terminal
windows for backend software; Windows users shouldn't be bothered by them
either.Don't try to visit .bit websites when blockchain isn't
downloaded
  Right now, visiting a .bit website with
an incomplete blockchain will use an older version of that name's data. 
Usually this results in a failure to load the page with no good explanation of
what's wrong, but in certain rare cases it could also hypothetically result in
security issues such as hijacking.  A better version of FreeSpeechMe
should refuse to use incomplete blockchains.
Facilitate non-Firefox usage
  FreeSpeechMe uses a networking method,
HTTP, which is specific to website traffic.  Replacing it with a different
method, SOCKS, would make it much more flexible, so you could use Dot-Bit for
non-website Internet applications such as SSH.  It should also be possible
to route other web browsers such as Chromium through FreeSpeechMe. 
FreeSpeechMe should support being installed as a standalone application for
users who don't use Firefox (although obviously Firefox will remain the main
method of installation).
Improvements for anonymous browsing
  Right now FreeSpeechMe supports routing
its traffic through anonymization proxies such as Tor and I2P (if they are
installed), but it is not compatible with TorBrowser, so while attackers
generally can't see your location or IP address, they can deduce that different
activities you do online may have come from the same person. FreeSpeechMe
should be improved to function in TorBrowser, which would prevent linkage of
different online activities.
Improvements for anonymous hosting
  FreeSpeechMe supports Tor and I2P hidden
services (if the user has Tor or I2P installed), but does not support Freenet,
OnionCat, GarliCat, or other anonymous hosting networks.  This should be
improved.
Support for next-gen TLS specification
  FreeSpeechMe is using a method of
specifying certificates to prevent hijacking which is deprecated in the Dot-Bit
specification. While this method remains very secure, the newer specification
has more features, and FreeSpeechMe should implement it.
HTTPS enforcement
  Websites which claim to support HTTPS in
their domain record should automatically be loaded in HTTPS, even if the user
accidentally forgets the "s", to prevent hijacking in such cases.
(Note for geeks: this is like the HSTS specification, but works even for sites
you haven't visited before.)
Intelligent Redirecting
  Websites that want to support Dot-Bit
should be able to do so without changing their server configuration, and
instead have FreeSpeechMe make the server think the preexisting domain is being
requested.  The user would still see the
Dot-Bit URL in Firefox, and unlike iframe-based methods, the URL displayed in
Firefox would change accordingly as the user clicks links..
Fix HTTP protocol bugs
  Unencrypted HTTP Dot-Bit websites
occasionally have odd behavior in FreeSpeechMe (sometimes manifesting as links
not working properly); this is most frequently seen in WordPress
websites.  While we strongly encourage the use of HTTPS (which isn't
subject to these bugs), we still want to fix the bugs with HTTP websites.
Round-Robin Load Balancing
  Some large websites use multiple server
IP addresses for a single domain.  FreeSpeechMe should be able to randomly
choose one.
OTHER NAMECOIN SOFTWARE IMPROVEMENTS 
  Some
of this is possibly out of the scope of this one Indiegogo campaign, depending
on funds raised. But these are things we're very interested in helping
implement:
Rebase on the latest Bitcoin code
  Namecoin is based on an outdated version
of Bitcoin (0.3.x).  We should rebase on a current release.  We
inquired with a well-qualified and well-respected contractor (who developed
Namecoin-Qt) about how much this rebase would cost; the estimate was around
$17,000-$35,000 US.  Spending that much on one project would be out of the
realm of this first campaign.  However, it
may be possible to reduce this cost significantly by rebasing on a codebase
other than Bitcoin, such as libcoin.
Improve scalability
  Namecoin currently requires having the
entire blockchain for good security.  While the 1.6GB blockchain isn't a
large concern right now, future scalability requires that clients be able to
securely resolve names without possessing the blockchain.  There is a
proposal for this called SPV+UTXO.
Automatic renewal of names
  Losing your names because you forgot to
renew them is a problem.  
Names should be able to be renewed automatically. Preferably
without decrypting the wallet each time the name is renewed, and maybe without
even needing your client to be open when it renews.  Any solution must be
trust-free.
Cold storage of Namecoin name keys
  To update a Namecoin name, the keys must
be decrypted on a computer with Internet access; this could be a security risk
if malware is installed on that computer.  To fix this, cold storage
should be used, as is possible with Bitcoin.  
  This
is in two parts: (1) port the Armory
client to Namecoin (this allows transactions to be signed offline), and (2)
allow a cold-storage name to be used as a revocation key for a hot-wallet name
(this is called the "import" field).
Optimize Speed
  Dot-Bit is already much faster than other
top-level domains for both name lookup and name propagation.  However, it
can be made even faster.  
We estimate that pre-cached name lookup time can be decreased
by 2- to 5-fold in some cases, uncached name lookup time can be decreased
significantly, name update propagation can be reduced from 40 minutes to under
1 minute, and blockchain sync time can be reduced significantly.
Android support
  Namecoin software currently does not
support Android; this situation should be improved.
Better blockchain anonymity
  Like Bitcoin, Namecoin can keep the
location and IP address of name owners anonymous (if used with Tor), but the
various activities of name owners can be linked by an attacker.  This
should be improved, e.g. by implementing Zerocoin.
Better blockchain privacy
  Some name owners may wish their records
to not be publicly accessible; encryption would improve this situation.
Decentralized website single sign-on
  Namecoin can be used to log into websites
in a secure way without needing a password (protecting people from database
leaks or cracked passwords without trusting a third party such as "all
your data are belong to us" systems like Facebook); this is implemented as
the NameID library by domob. 
Unfortunately, this library is not easy for non-programmers to integrate with
existing websites. Plugins should be created for major website backends such as
Drupal, phpBB, WordPress, and SMF, to allow trust-free NameID sign-on to be as
easy as checking a box.
Automated builds
  Namecoin software should support
automated builds and testing so that our developers and testers can work more
efficiently.  The builds should also be deterministic (as Bitcoin and Tor
are doing) to improve security.
Offline signing of static websites
  Verifying signatures of static websites
against the blockchain would prevent hijacking even if a web server is
completely compromised.
SSH client integration
  Log into your servers remotely without
trusting your network or manually verifying fingerprints, using the same
anti-hijacking features that FreeSpeechMe first implemented.
PERKSThey are all pretty nifty and fun. But we've chosen each perk carefully; they all promote the FreeSpeechMe plug-in. Because the primary goals of this campaign are: 
Promoting FreeSpeechMe
 Improving the software and the methodologies for adopting and utilizing it

Spreading adoption Dot-Bit

Closing Arguments
It's often remarked that the Internet runs the world.  But if governments, corporations, and criminals can censor and hijack websites at will, the end result won't be good for the Internet, or the world.  We have a solid track record working with the technologies behind Dot-Bit.  We created the first ever implementation of the Dot-Bit feature which prevents HTTPS hijacking, as well as the first ever trust-free Dot-Bit Firefox plug-in.  We are an active participant in the Dot-Bit and Namecoin development process.FreeSpeechMe is a
game-changing world-advancing leap for freedom. Please help us raise
50,000 dollars to further perfect the FreeSpeechMe Free Software
plug-in, spread its adoption and adoption of Dot-Bit, and help save the Internet from the website censors and hijackers of the world.

story:
Short Summary

I sat at home 18/4/2014 I take allsorts of calls, who I am isn't important, Kevin is . The words he spoke to me that night struck a chord with me "I just want to be able to see my grandchild, i'm not asking for alot just a little more time" Kevin has cancer, whilst we were tucking into our chocolate eggs this easter Kevin's family recieved devastating news...

Extensive Liver Cancer and abdominal, in short , Chemo may give him a little more time, should it work.

What Kevin Need's

A miracle, A trial, a fighting chance, a glimmer of hope, to buy time, so this is simply a request for a chance at buying more time . It's  as simple as that.

Other Ways You Can Help - share this page on twitter , on facebook any where you can , donate a pound , what you give can help give Kevin more time ...

Time is the precious gift we  have to give, a fighting fund will help in buyng extra time.

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
My name is Lisa Poland.  I am the development coordinator for The Snyder Center for Aphasia Life Enhancement (SCALE)- a community treatment center for people with aphasia and their families.  Imagine losing your ability to speak, read, write, or understand – while at the same time, your intellectual capacities and memory remain intact. This debilitating and frustrating condition is called “aphasia,” from the Greek word for “speechlessness.” Commonly caused by a stroke, brain tumor, head injury, or neurological disorder, aphasia is the result of damage to the language center of the brain. Aphasia is often mistaken for deafness, psychiatric illness, alcoholism, or developmental disability. Aphasia does not discriminate – it can happen to anyone, at any age, at any time.  In fact, almost 2 million Americans suffer from aphasia.

My brother-in-law, Keith had a stroke at the age of 40.  It was massive.  He was unable to speak or write and, like many stroke survivors, was paralyzed on his right side.  Keith spent the first two months in the hospital doing intensive speech, occupational, and physical therapy.  My sister, Jane, networked extensively to find the best therapy available, battle with insurance companies, and do whatever necessary to ensure Keith would have the best recovery possible.  SCALE has been a godsend, but insurance didn’t cover the cost of the program.   

  SCALE is a unique facility, specifically designed to improve not only speech and communication, but also the quality of life for those who struggle with aphasia. Aphasia is an extremely isolating condition that can lead to severe depression. It not only steals one’s ability to speak and read, it also severs one’s ability to connect with family, friends improve, and everyday life. That is why SCALE puts “community” at the heart of all its programs and services. SCALE provides a community of peers as well as many opportunities to work with trained professionals who support and guide individuals with aphasia as they reengage in life.

Keith has worked incredibly hard since his stroke. He spends close to thirty hours every week in speech therapy, the majority of which is done at SCALE. With this therapy, Keith has been able to reclaim a significant portion of his life, including, most importantly, his ability to communicate with his family and friends. He has learned new skills to support his communication and uses an array of technology to engage with his peers and family.  Many SCALE members have also made life-changing progress while at SCALE.

Unfortunately, people with aphasia need a lifetime of therapy and medical insurance does not cover the services provided at SCALE. Further, individuals with aphasia and paralysis are usually unable to return to work. Therefore, there are many people with aphasia who don’t have resources to pay for ongoing treatment or the support of family to advocate on their behalf.  This is why I felt the need to post this request.  Everyone should be able to receive the needed long-term therapy, money should not be a factor.

 It is our mission to be their voice. SCALE is in desperate need of funds for scholarships.  SCALE members are asked to pay a tuition fee based on their individual financial situation and many applicants require scholarship support. For every $25 that you contribute to SCALE, you will sponsor a class for a member. Your $100 gift will support a full day of classes for a member or materials for an entire semester for SCALE’s art therapy program. If you cannot contribute, please help us by increasing awareness of aphasia.  Please tell at least one person in your social network about this unique organization and define the word aphasia for them.

story:
Short Summary

Eric is a disabled veteran who recently suffered a stroke which took his balance away. He was an avid skiier and cyclist before the stroke and wants to get back into cycling both for fitness and rehabilitation reasons. This recumbent trike will be the perfect thing to help Eric back on his feet and walking again. 

In return for your generosity 

Eric can't offer much in return but you'll surely receive good karma for helping him get back on his feet. 

The Impact

Coming from an active lifestyle of skiing and biking the stroke has had a devastating impact on Eric's way of life.  What this trike will provide is another stepping stone, along with physical therapy, to get Eric back out enjoying the road with the goal of getting him to walk again.

This recumbent trike will be the perfect thing to help Eric back on his feet and walking again. In return for your generosity Eric can't offer much in return but you'll surely receive good karma for helping him get back on his feet. The ImpactComing from an active lifestyle of skiing and biking the stroke has had a devastating impact on Eric's way of life.  What this trike will provide is another stepping stone, along with physical therapy, to get Eric back out enjoying the road with the goal of getting him to walk again.

story:
Emmunify uses communications technology to help vaccinate more infants so they can live longer, do better in school, have higher cognitive abilities, less malnutrition, earn more as adults, and get out of poverty.


Emmunify

Two years ago we started Emmunify to use technology to increase vaccination by connecting those who need vaccinations with those who provide vaccinations and those who plan and supply vaccinations.  And to do it cheaply! Through hard work we won some awards for the idea at UC Berkeley Hacking  Health  and BigIdeas@Berkeley.  We used the prize money to test a prototype in the New Delhi slums where less than 50% of children are fully immunized.

We received enthusiastic responses from families and health workers and  great interest in using the Emmunify platform as soon as possible.  Now we are asking you to support us to write the software code, purchase the hardware, and test it among a larger group of families.

What We Need & What You Get

The $25,000 initial goal will support:

Software Development, including:

  • The application for use on the tablet that the health workers use to read and update the vaccine record on the chip
  • The interface between the tablet and the cloud
  • Cloud analytics and dashboard
  • Reminder messages for families in local language via voice mail and SMS
Implementation of the system with Aarushi Charitable Trust(ACT), a not for profit which provides girls’ education and family health services in the New Delhi slums:
  • Train health workers and supervisors who will use the Emmunify tablets
  • Purchase tablets for health workers and chips for each child
  • Payment of supervisors

  • Track vaccinations for 9  months among 50 infants

We gratefully acknowledge all your donations and look forward to sending you one or more our perks listed here on the campaign page.

The Impact
Why are Vaccines important?  Vaccines stop preventable diseases and in turn, save lives, prevent disability and illness, and reduce health care expenses and help break the cycle of poverty.  Among the poorest, vaccinating just an additional 100 children can save two lives!


Why aren’t children vaccinated?  Many obstacles prevent infants from receiving even the most basic vaccines, and the Emmunify platform helps solve these.


How Emmunify Works

To improve delivery of immunizations, we set ourselves a few goals:

  • Can we make an immunization medical record that is easy to carry, easy to use and easy for patients to move between care providers?
  • Can we make it usable without wifi, phone service, or electricity?
  • Can we make it resilient to heat, humidity, and rain?
  • And can we keep costs to a minimum?
  • Each child has a small chip with its current vaccination information that is stuck on the family mobile phone.
The Solution:
  • At a vaccination site, the health worker uses a tablet to read the chip by Near Field Communication. She provides the needed vaccine and immediately rewrites and updates the chip and no WiFi, Phone service, or electricity is needed.
  • When the health worker later has access to WiFi or phone, this information is transmitted to the cloud. The cloud analytics are used to organize vaccine distribution, supplies and purchases.
  • Emmunify then sends automated voice mail and SMS messages to families to tell them when vaccines are needed, and where to get them. When the family comes for vaccination, supplies are ready to go. The health workers rapidly determine which vaccines are needed, and waiting times are much shorter.


  • Many families have a hard time keeping track of their children’s vaccination records. Emmunify digitizes these records and keeps them in a chip stuck to the family’s mobile phone, so they are easy to locate and update.

Essentially all families have cell phones in India.  Mobile adoption is projected at 72% by 2016. [1] For families in the slums, phones are a valuable possession and are securely carried. Even with high mobile adoption, slums and outlying areas still have problems with consistent phone and data service connectivity.

[1] Gartner, Inc. Gartner Says India Mobile Services Market to Reach US$30 Billion in 2016. http://www.gartner.com/newsroom/id/1963915. [Accessed 11 Nov 2014].


What has Emmunify done so far?

  • Health workers, mothers, and administrators in the New Delhi slums with the Aarushi Charitable Trust have already tried the prototype and enthusiastically look forward to using the entire system.
  • Together our team has more than 30 years of experience executing health programs in India and other poor countries.
  • As a contributor you know that you have helped more poor children get vaccinated and stay alive, and get out of poverty.


Looking forward

As we move forward with the next phase of work, we understand the challenges which projects such as ours have faced in the past, and will address at every stage in the planning and execution process:

  • End-user adherence to the platform
  • Mobilizing local partners
  • Creating a sustainable program
  • Keeping up with demand for technology
  • Appropriately communicating vaccination information to purchasers & suppliers
Our Emmunify team includes a UC Berkeley Haas MBA, an MPH from the School of Public Health, 3 current MPH students, and a Professor of Maternal and Child Health and International Health.  Each have unique skills in program planning, global health, business development, and technology to have a truly interdisciplinary focus under the same vision. We are passionate about improving health in poor countries using information & communication technologies. 

Ways to Help

Our big challenge is to ensure widespread usage of the Emmunify system.  With your support we can test this in at least 50 children. With more support, we can test in a much larger population. With results from that trial, our team can garner additional funds to conduct larger trials to demonstrate how Emmunify increases vaccination rates in large populations.  health systems and international donors will then invest in widespread usage. 

What you can do!  Please contribute and help both save lives and move children out of poverty.  If you cannot, then spread the word for this campaign to your friends and family. 

Thanks so much for your support.

story:
Short Summary

Please Donate To Cannabis Freedom Riders USA For Upcoming Tour in Florida.

We Will Be Touring Across The State Of Florida For Medical Cannabis and Industrial Hemp Freedom.


Facebook Us To Get Involved!

https://www.facebook.com/freedomridersusa


What We Need 

Come Ride With Us !

WE All Know what WE need!! Freedom, Knowledge, Compassion, Teamwork, and Unrestricted Access To a Natural Medicine "Cannabis".

Cannabis Freedom Riders USA ~ Needs everyone that is able, willing  to help with this tour. We need handouts designed and printed, to be handed out to everyone we meet on the tour. Help with camp sites for the team along route. 

    The Impact

    Raising Awareness For Medical Marijuana and Industrial Hemp. Time to share with everyone the facts concerning this single Plant. Taking the News and Information to the People, the cities and the streets. :)


        Other Ways You Can Help

        Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

        Spread the Word :)

        Join in and Ride a Mile or two :) or the Whole thing . (Please be advised we are camping the whole trip and each member is responsible for sharing the costs of camp spot and remember to bring your own personal needs for Camping *example sleeping bags,tent, and Bicycle :) lol  )

        We need Printed Information sheets that will be used for handing out.

story:
Git-deliver

Git-deliver intends to be a simple and secure way to:

  • deliver software onto servers
  • know what version of your software is on which server, when and by whom it was delivered, and whether (and how) it was altered since delivery
  • write and reuse delivery "recipes"


Git-deliver combines:

  • Git for version control, data transfer and integrity assurance
  • SSH for authentication and remote command execution.
  • Bash for custom delivery scripting


Compared to a regular Git push/checkout, Git-deliver :

  • makes the delivery atomic
  • structures the delivery process in stages and handles errors while maintaining availability
  • archives delivered versions and automates rollback
  • logs everything
  • provides an easy way of knowing what is delivered where, checking integrity and knowing when and by whom a version was delivered.
  • intends to provide pre-baked delivery recipes for common development environments


I have a working prototype on Github, with more information and documentation : https://github.com/arnoo/git-deliver/

By funding this Indiegogo project, you'd be funding the transformation of my prototype into a robust and well documented piece of software.

What would it look like ?


Let's assume you have a Rails project. After installing git-deliver, you run

git deliver --list-presets

and notice that a "rails" preset is listed.

You cd to the root of your Git working copy and you type

git deliver --init rails

This will create a .deliver directory (which you would add to your Git index). In this directory are "stage scripts" : they are bash scripts that will perform the Rails-specific parts (database migration, etc.) at the various standardized "stages" in a Git-deliver delivery (or rollback). You can customize these stage scripts at will. After customization, you might even want to turn them into your own preset so that you can run

git deliver --init my_preset

for your next projects.

If your project is simple enough that a delivery is just about copying files, you don't even need to use stage scripts or a preset.

Once Git-deliver is initialized, assuming each of the servers you want to deliver to contains a bare Git repo that is setup in Git as an ssh remote, you can use

git deliver <remote> <ref>

to deliver your project as of <ref> (a commit sha1, branch name, or tag) to <remote>


After your first delivery, <remote> will contain all the usual for a bare Git repo, plus a 'delivered' directory, in which you will find :

  • One non-bare Git repo for each delivery. These Git repos share their metadata with the main repo to avoid excessive disk space usage. A delivery commit is made automatically to preserve the state of the project on delivery after your scripts have run. For extra sagety, this commit can be signed.
  • A symlink, named "current", which points to the currently delivered version. This not only gives you a constant path to point to the current version of the project, but also makes the switch to a new version "atomic".


Should anything fail, either in the standard delivery process or your custom scripts (which signal it via their exit status), Git-deliver will properly cancel the delivery, getting you back to the previous version, however advanced the delivery stage.

git deliver --status

tells you which version is delivered on which remote, when and by whom it was delivered, and whether it was altered since delivery.

git deliver --status <remote>

gives you all the versions still available on <remote>. You can rollback to one of these versions using

git deliver --rollback <remote><version>

git deliver --gc <remote>

cleans up on <remote>, removing all but the last three deliveries.

git deliver --init-remote <remote-name> <remote-url>

can be used to automatically create the bare git repo, add the remote to your local Git as <remote-name>, and if applicable run your "init-remote" stage scripts to initialize the remote (install dependencies for instance).

 

Roadmap


Although the prototype is mostly usable, it still has rough edges, and a few bugs. It's also missing a few important features. You can see the list of open Github issues (https://github.com/arnoo/git-deliver/issues?sta...) for details.

Here's what I want to do :

  • do a thorough code review and make the code cleaner and more maintainable
  • reorganise the test suite, make existing tests more pertinent, and add a lot more tests
  • fix as many important GitHub issues (https://github.com/arnoo/git-deliver/issues?sta...) as possible : both existing issues (known bugs and missing important features) and new issues I'm sure you'll submit
  • Improve the documentation, including a basic website
  • Hopefully deal with pull-requests for presets as people start using Git-deliver


All funds collected will be used towards work on the project. The more funds there are, the more features, documentation, presets, etc. I can ship.


About me


I've been a professional software developer for 7 years, and a passionate amateur one for about 18. My personal and professional projects have been pretty varied : I've been a system and network administrator for a few months, worked as a developer on projects using C#, Java, PHP, Perl, Common-Lisp... and done quite a lot of consulting and teaching.

I've used Git extensively for more than 5 years. I successfully organised transitions from other version control systems and taught Git to a good number of people.

In my free time, I paddle my canoe, study and teach Krav-Maga, play the violin and code, mainly in Lisp.

As all passionate developers, I have too many projects and too little time. I really believe in this project, which is why I'd like to be able to spend more time on it and really bring it to fruition. I hope you'll feel the same after reading this.


Schedule


I plan to continue working on the project in my free time. In addition to week-ends and mornings/evenings, I have secured one free day a week from my employer for the coming weeks. I intend to put in about a day a week total, a bit more at times.



Other ways to support the project


Another way to support the project is to hire me for consulting through my employer, Key Consulting. I can help you get started with Git, including Git-deliver. I can work remotely, or you can pay for my travel from Paris, France. Contact me at arnaud.betremieux@keyconsulting.fr for more information.

story:
Soccer is a sport that not only is fun, but also enriches the lives of those who play it. As a USSF Licensed youth soccer coach, my philosophy is to teach the kids about life through the sport of soccer. In doing so, I try to impress upon them importance of teamwork, leadership, community, health, and nutrition. Because not many of these kids will move on to be professional soccer players, I believe it is more important that they learn to be strong, honest, healthy people.

The Ingraham Rams Boys Soccer Team is the strongest it has been in years, and is looking to expand. The potential to have a successful season is high, but unfortunately requires more than the team can give. As the coach of the team, I strongly believe that school sports need to be a free activity for all of the students. For the program to be both free and open to all students, we need funds to establish a third team to provide roster space so that we do not have to cut; and find funds to run the team so that no one is excluded due to fees. To afford the expansion of adding another team, we need your help. Many of these kids have other commitments outside of school and soccer including but not limited to work, taking care of family, and other sports. Please consider giving what you can, as every dollar is one less that these kids will need to pay.

As this is a school soccer program, we have little funds and mostly donated  equipment. In order for the team to run as I envision, we are looking to raise $2,000.This total can be broken into subcategories. The most expensive of which is new uniforms. Due to the lack of funding in the program, we do not have enough to supply our current Varsity and Junior Varsity squads with proper jerseys, an important part of team sports. Because of this, the dream of adding a third team to the program is impossible to achieve without a new set of jerseys. For 44 Jerseys with shorts that meet our league requirements, the cost is $1,250. This is an essential cost! The team has not received new jerseys since they were last donated years ago, and the league has updated the  uniform  requirements. In addition to new jerseys, the team has to acquire new equipment of the team to use. I currently have donated all of the balls in the program. With a third team forming, I have run out of balls to provide, and the cost of a new set is $100. The team will be coached by former players that have recently graduated from Ingraham . As they are young and in college, I would love to be able to provide them with money for their time. At a rate of $10/hr, I could ask them to give 2 hours a day for three days a week (two practices and one game) for 10 weeks and it would cost the program $600 per coach. As that would be $1,200, I am already over budget. Because I chose to take over this soccer program to give back to the community, I am willing to donate the rest of the money out of my check from the school. If we are unable to raise enough funds to establish a third team, I will use the amount we do raise, and subtract it from any fee that I have to charge the kids to make up the difference. Therefore, every dollar counts.

Every dollar you give is going to be one less dollar the hardworking players will owe. Please share this link to anyone you know who is associated to Ingraham, or wants to be. Help me provide the kids with a healthy activity in an enriching environment that is free and fun.

story:
THANK YOU so much to everyone who helped me reach my goal!! Even though I have reached the $1500 that I set for this particular fundraiser, any more contributions are still welcome and greatly appreciated! 


Short Summary

If you know me, you know that I'm passionate about photography. I have decided to use this passion to to make a real difference in underprivileged communities and fragile ecosystems. There are many countries around the world that are in need, but my heart really goes out to Ghana. Most Ghanaians remain among the world's poorest people, earning an average of less than $4 per day, and a large percent of the population lacks in basic needs. Ghana's wildlife is threatened by poaching, human settlement, and habitat loss brought on by deforestation. Today, only around 33% of Ghana is still forested, and this number depletes by about 1.3% each year, which significantly affects the ecosystem. There are an unfortunate number of endangered species in Ghana, including the African elephant, the chimpanzee, and the Diana monkey. Other species including the lion, the pied bat, the red-fronted gazelle, the spotted-necked otter, and the white-toothed shrew are currently vulnerable to endangerment. 

 

The Details

I will be participating in a few volunteer projects in Ghana, including the following:

Orphanages - this project is in Koforidua, and focuses on working and caring for orphans, aged 1-23. 

Teaching and phyical education: - this is a program to help young athletes in high schools by providing physical education classes and assistant coaches for school teams. 

National Parks and Reserves - these parks have been established to protect animals and their natural habitats, not only for conservation, but for research and study as well. The goal of this project is to help educate tourists and local communities on the importance of wildlife and environmental conservation.

 

I will be using my skills as a photographer to help out with all of these projects in August 2012. I will be traveling between Koforidua and Mole National Park, as well as some smaller conservation sites. I will be documenting the daily lives of Ghanaians and volunteers and use these images to bring awareness to the issues in Ghana. In the national parks and reserves, I will be photographing wildlife for the use of education and images that the gift shops can use to help raise money for conservation and awareness. 

 

Why I need your help

What I need funding for: 

- Placement fee (which includes accomodation and 2 meals a day): $1200

- Flights: $3000

-Volunteer Work Visa: $200

-Vaccinations and Medication: $400

-All in-country transportation between cities and national parks

-Equipment (extra memory cards, batteries, portable hard drives etc.)

I am working very hard to raise as much of this money that I can myself. I have picked up a couple extra jobs, as well as moved into my friends living room for cheaper rent (Thanks, Ariel!) Above and beyond my stated budget, I will be saving my money for a laptop to process and edit my images. Even though I am doing everything I can to get myself to Ghana, I can't make that much money in just a few months, so that is why I need your help!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help! All you need to do is help me spread the word, share this page with your family, friends, and co-workers. I appreciate all of your support!!

story:
My Story

What's up I'm Johnny. I'm from New Jersey. I'm trying to raise money for Breast Cancer. I have two family members who had breast cancer a few friends who also have family members with it as well. I started last year in July with my good friend Alan to raise money for the cause. We raised over $500 with some help from co workers and friends. I'm trying to raise the same amount or more for the cause. Everything will be donated to Susan G Komen. That's what I did last year with all the money. I will be running in a race once a month starting June. I got custom Reebok Zig's made black and pink for the races to show my support. My body Zuece at Reebok hooked me up.


The Impact

Help raise as much money as possible for such a great cause. I would like others to race/walk with us as well.


What We Need & What You Get

You will need a debit/credit card and money. Any amount will do.


Other Ways You Can Help

Come run with me.
